210100 - Disclosure - Balance Sheet Offs.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

210100 - Disclosure - Balance Sheet Offs.name: SecuritiesLoanedAndSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementToRepurchaseGrossIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement

children.name: SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseGrossIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
children.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset.
children.disclosure: 210100 - Disclosure - Balance Sheet Offsetting

children.name: SecuritiesLoanedGrossIncludingNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
children.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset.
children.disclosure: 210100 - Disclosure - Balance Sheet Offsetting

210100 - Disclosure - Balance Sheet Offs.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral and funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

210100 - Disclosure - Balance Sheet Offs.name: DerivativeAssetSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesBorrowed

children.name: DerivativeAssetSecurityPurchasedUnderAgreementToResellSecurityBorrowedAfterOffsetSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
children.description: Amount, after effect of master netting arrangement, of derivative asset, security purchased under agreement to resell, and security borrowed. Includes financial instrument subject to master netting arrangement not elected or qualified to offset. Excludes asset not subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement.
children.disclosure: 210100 - Disclosure - Balance Sheet Offsetting

children.name: DerivativeAssetSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesBorrowedNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
children.description: Amount of derivative assets, securities purchased under agreements to resell and securities borrowed, not subject to a master netting arrangement.
children.disclosure: 210100 - Disclosure - Balance Sheet Offsetting

210100 - Disclosure - Balance Sheet Offs.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative assets, securities purchased under agreements to resell and securities borrowed. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

210100 - Disclosure - Balance Sheet Offs.name: DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesLoaned

children.name: DerivativeLiabilitySecuritySoldUnderAgreementToRepurchaseSecurityLoanedAfterOffsetSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
children.description: Amount, after effect of master netting arrangement, of derivative liability, security sold under agreement to repurchase, and security loaned. Includes financial instrument subject to master netting arrangement not elected or qualified to offset. Excludes liability not subject to master netting arrangement or similar agreement.
children.disclosure: 210100 - Disclosure - Balance Sheet Offsetting

children.name: DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToResellSecuritiesLoanedNotSubjectToMasterNettingArrangement
children.description: Amount of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned, not subject to a master netting arrangement.
children.disclosure: 210100 - Disclosure - Balance Sheet Offsetting

210100 - Disclosure - Balance Sheet Offs.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

Not Applicable.name: DepreciationAmortizationAndAccretionNet
Not Applicable.description: The aggregate net amount of depreciation, amortization, and accretion recognized during an accounting period. As a noncash item, the net amount is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

108000 - Statement - Statement of Financ.name: Assets

children.name: CashCashEquivalentsAndFederalFundsSold
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue
children.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalent. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalFundsSold
children.description: The amount outstanding of funds lent to other depository institutions, securities brokers, or securities dealers in the form of Federal Funds sold; for example, immediately available funds lent under agreements or contracts that mature in one business day or roll over under a continuing contract, regardless of the nature of the transaction or the collateral involved, excluding overnight lending for commercial and industrial purposes. Also include Federal Funds sold under agreements to resell on a gross basis, excluding (1) sales of term Federal Funds, (2) due bills representing purchases of securities or other assets by the reporting bank that have not yet been delivered and similar instruments, (3) resale agreements that mature in more than one business day involving assets other than securities, and (4) yield maintenance dollar repurchase agreements.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: The sum of cash and cash equivalents plus Federal Funds Sold. Cash and cash equivalents consist of short term, highly liquid investments that are readily convertible to known amounts of cash and are so near their maturity that they present negligible risk of changes in value due to changes in interest rates -- usually with an original maturity less than 90 days.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherRestrictedAssets
RestrictedCashAndInvestments
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue
children.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalent restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsNoncurrent
children.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalent restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as noncurrent. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalent restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: CashCollateralForBorrowedSecurities
children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of cash collateral held for borrowed securities, for which the cash is restricted as to withdrawal or usage.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: RestrictedInvestments
RestrictedInvestmentsCurrent
children.description: This element represents the current portion of investments which are not defined as or included in marketable (debt, equity, or other) securities that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: RestrictedInvestmentsNoncurrent
children.description: This element represents the noncurrent portion of investments which are not defined as or included in marketable (debt, equity, or other) securities that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Investments which are not defined as or included in marketable (debt, equity, or other) securities whose use is restricted in whole or in part, generally by contractual agreements or regulatory requirements. For use in an unclassified balance sheet.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DepositAssets
SecurityDeposit
children.description: The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DepositContractsAssets
children.description: Carrying amount of assets as of the balance sheet date pertaining to amounts paid by the insured (including a ceding company) under insurance or reinsurance contracts for which insurance risk is not transferred.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: RetainageDeposit
children.description: The amount of assets, typically cash, provided to suppliers of goods in advance of receipt and acceptance, or services (such as research facilities, lawyers or consultants), which is held by such parties until the entity either effects full payment (including applying the retainer) or obtains release from liability.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: MarginDepositAssets
children.description: The amount of cash or securities placed with a broker or counterparty as security for a trading or derivatives securities position which was partially obtained with funds provided by the broker dealer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: EscrowDeposit
children.description: The designation of funds furnished by a borrower to a lender to assure future payments of the borrower's real estate taxes and insurance obligations with respect to a mortgaged property. Escrow deposits may be made for a variety of other purposes such as earnest money and contingent payments. This element excludes replacement reserves which are an escrow separately provided for within the US GAAP taxonomy.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DepositsWithClearingOrganizationsAndOthersSecurities
children.description: The amount of securities on deposit with clearing organizations and other entities which provide services necessary to operations of the Company. This item would include, for instance, securities advanced as refundable collateral for securities borrowed.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: EarnestMoneyDeposits
children.description: A deposit made by a purchaser of real estate to evidence good faith. It is customary for a buyer to give the seller earnest money at the time a sales contract is signed. The earnest money generally is credited to the down payment at closing, which is applied at closing as a component of payment against the purchase price.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: The carrying amount of the asset transferred to a third party to serve as a deposit, which typically serves as security against failure by the transferor to perform under terms of an agreement.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Cash and investments whose use in whole or in part is restricted for the long-term, generally by contractual agreements or regulatory requirements. For use in an unclassified balance sheet.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: CashAndSecuritiesSegregatedUnderFederalAndOtherRegulations
CashAndSecuritiesSegregatedUnderSecuritiesExchangeCommissionRegulation
children.description: Cash and securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: CashAndSecuritiesSegregatedUnderCommodityExchangeActRegulation
children.description: Cash and securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to the Commodity Exchange Act.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: CashSegregatedUnderOtherRegulations
children.description: Cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to regulations other than SEC Regulations and the Commodity Exchange Act.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: SecuritiesSegregatedUnderOtherRegulations
children.description: Fair value of securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to regulations other than SEC Regulations and the Commodity Exchange Act.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount of cash subject to withdrawal restrictions, restricted deposits held as compensating balances, and cash and securities segregated in compliance with regulations (such as cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ReplacementReserveEscrow
children.description: This element represents those amounts set aside for the repair and replacement of real or personal property in the foreseen future. Such amount may be funded from sales revenue (for example; timeshare sales) or operating revenues; in a lump sum or installments (such as monthly); as per internal policy (for example: hotel operators), as required by contractual agreement (for example: sales contract); or by the terms of debt agreements.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Total assets that cannot be used for operating purposes because of contract or regulatory requirements that are in effect for a period that extends beyond one year.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: LeveragedLeasesNetInvestmentInLeveragedLeasesDisclosureInvestmentInLeveragedLeasesNet
children.description: The net investment in arrangements meeting the criteria for classification as leveraged leases including deferred taxes.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankStockAndFederalReserveBankStock
FederalHomeLoanBankStock
children.description: Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock represents an equity interest in a FHLB. It does not have a readily determinable fair value because its ownership is restricted and it lacks a market (liquidity).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalReserveBankStock
children.description: Federal Reserve Bank stock represents an equity interest in the Federal Reserve Bank. It does not have a readily determinable fair value because its ownership is restricted and it lacks a market (liquidity).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) and Federal Reserve Bank stock.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: CollateralizedAgreements
SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResell
children.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes purchases of participations in pools of securities that are subject to a resale agreement, assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: SecuritiesBorrowed
children.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: SecuritiesReceivedAsCollateral
children.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the assets received as collateral against securities loaned to other broker-dealers. Borrowers of securities generally are required to provide collateral to the lenders of securities, commonly cash but sometimes other securities or standby letters of credit, with a value slightly higher than that of the securities borrowed. In instances where the entity is permitted to sell or re-pledge these securities, the entity reports the fair value of the collateral received and the related obligation to return the collateral as a liability.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: SecuredDemandNotes
children.description: Represents the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of loans made to broker-dealers which are generally secured by marketable securities owned by the borrower broker-dealer but held by the lender, are interest-bearing, and payable upon demand. The right to demand payment may be conditioned upon the occurrence of certain events.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: The total of collateralized agreements including securities purchased under agreements to resell (repos), borrowed securities, and secured demand notes.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvances
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesParValue
DepositLiabilitiesReclassifiedAsLoansReceivable1
children.description: Amount of deposits held by the entity that have been reclassified as loan balances receivable, for example, but not limited to, overdrafts receivable.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryInNextRollingTwelveMonths
children.description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryInRollingYearTwo
children.description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryInRollingYearThree
children.description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryInRollingYearFour
children.description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryInRollingYearFive
children.description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryAfterRollingYearFive
children.description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesIndexAmortizing
children.description: Par amount of index amortizing advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesCommitmentFees
children.description: Amount of unearned commitment fees on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesDiscountOnAffordableHousingProgram
children.description: Amount of unamortized discount on outstanding Affordable Housing Program (AHP) advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesPremium
children.description: Amount of unearned premiums on outstanding advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesDiscount
children.description: Amount of unamortized discount on outstanding advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesValuationAdjustmentsForHedgingActivities
children.description: Amount of accumulated increase (decrease) on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) from hedging adjustments.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesValuationAdjustmentsUnderFairValueOption
children.description: Amount of accumulated increase (decrease) on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) from fair value option adjustments.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances to member financial institutions.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: GuarantyAssets
children.description: The carrying amount of the contractual right to receive fees, as compensation in exchange for providing a guarantee to a third party, over life of the guarantee.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: CashSurrenderValueOfLifeInsurance
children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts which could be received based on the terms of the insurance contract upon surrendering life policies owned by the entity.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DueFromCustomerAcceptances
children.description: Amounts receivable from customers on short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by the institution (also known as banker's acceptance transactions) that are outstanding on the reporting date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
children.description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes net investment in lease.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossExcludingAccruedInterest
children.description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes net investment in lease.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes net investment in lease.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityExcludingAccruedInterestBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
children.description: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAllowanceForCreditLossExcludingAccruedInterest
children.description: Amount, excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: NetInvestmentInLeaseExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
NetInvestmentInLeaseExcludingAccruedInterestBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
children.description: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: NetInvestmentInLeaseAllowanceForCreditLossExcludingAccruedInterest
children.description: Amount, excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAmortizedCostExcludingAccruedInterestAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAmortizedCostExcludingAccruedInterestBeforeAllowanceForCreditLoss
children.description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAmortizedCostAllowanceForCreditLossExcludingAccruedInterest
children.description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AccountsReceivableNet
ReceivablesFromCustomers
children.description: Amount due from customers for fees and charges arising from transactions related to the entity's brokerage activities and operations.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ReceivablesFromBrokersDealersAndClearingOrganizations
DepositsPaidForSecuritiesBorrowedAtCarryingValue
children.description: This is the amount of cash advanced as security in return for borrowing securities from another party.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: SecuritiesFailedToDeliver
children.description: Amount receivable as the result of a fail-to-deliver. A fail-to-deliver is a securities sale to another broker-dealer that has not been delivered to buying broker-dealer by the close of business on the settlement date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DueFromCorrespondentBrokers
children.description: Amount receivable from correspondent broker-dealer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ReceivablesFromClearingOrganizations
children.description: Amount of right to receive cash and securities on deposit with clearing organizations. Clearing organizations perform post trade processing and trade comparisons among numerous broker-dealers and act as settlement agents between buying and selling broker-dealers.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: GoodFaithAndMarginDepositsWithBrokerDealers
children.description: Amount of right to receive cash and securities on deposit with broker-dealers to demonstrate an intention to complete a purchase (good faith deposit) and collateral deposited by counterparty to cover the credit risk assumed (margin deposit).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: CommissionsAndFloorBrokerageReceivables
children.description: Amount receivable from broker-dealers from commissions for executing orders on the floor of an exchange.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherReceivablesFromBrokerDealersAndClearingOrganizations
children.description: Amount of other receivables due from broker-dealers or clearing organizations.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: VariationMarginReceivableDerivative
children.description: Amount of receivable from positive price movement on derivative.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DepositSecuritySoldShort
children.description: Amount of deposit for security sold short.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DepositDerivativeContract
children.description: Amount of deposit for derivative.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount receivable from broker-dealers and clearing organizations, including, but not limited to, securities failed-to-deliver, certain deposits for securities borrowed, open transactions, good faith and margin deposits, commissions and floor brokerage receivables.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AccountsReceivableFromSecuritization
children.description: The amount owed to the reporting entity by counterparties in securitized loan transactions.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AccountsReceivableBilledForLongTermContractsOrPrograms
UnbilledContractsReceivable
children.description: Unbilled amounts due for services rendered or to be rendered, actions taken or to be taken, or a promise to refrain from taking certain actions in accordance with the terms of a legally binding agreement between the entity and, at a minimum, one other party. An example would be amounts associated with contracts or programs where the recognized revenue for performance thereunder exceeds the amounts billed under the terms thereof as of the date of the balance sheet.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs but not paid. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: NotesReceivableGross
children.description: Amortized cost, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement and net investment in lease.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AccruedInvestmentIncomeReceivable
children.description: Interest, dividends, rents, ancillary and other revenues earned but not yet received by the entity on its investments.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: PremiumsReceivableAtCarryingValue
PremiumsReceivableGross
children.description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, due the entity from (a) agents and insureds, (b) uncollected premiums and (c) others, before deducting the allowance for doubtful accounts.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAccounts
children.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the estimated valuation allowance to reduce gross premiums receivable to net realizable value.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date due the entity from (a) agents and insureds, (b) uncollected premiums and (c) others, net of the allowance for doubtful accounts.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ReceivableInvestmentSale
children.description: Amount of receivable from sale of investment.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: NontradeReceivables
CreditCardReceivables
children.description: Amounts receivable from issuing a card to individuals or businesses that allows someone to make a purchase on borrowed money.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DividendAndInterestReceivable
DividendsReceivable
children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but not received.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: InterestReceivable
children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount of dividend and interest receivable from investment.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: IncomeTaxReceivable
children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of income taxes previously overpaid to tax authorities (such as U.S. Federal, state and local tax authorities) representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes. Also called income tax refund receivable.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ValueAddedTaxReceivable
children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of value added taxes due either from customers arising from sales on credit terms, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ReceivableForRecoveryOfImportDutiesNet
children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of tariffs due either from customers or suppliers arising from sales or purchases, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities or vendors.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: InsuranceSettlementsReceivable
children.description: Amount due in settlement of a claim for reimbursement from an insurance company when the Company has suffered a loss covered under an insurance policy.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: GrantsReceivable
children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts due under the terms of governmental, corporate, or foundation grants.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: InsuranceReceivableForMalpractice
InsuranceReceivableForMalpracticeCurrent
children.description: The current portion of the amount receivable from insurance and similar arrangements for reimbursement and payment of malpractice claims and litigation costs.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: InsuranceReceivableForMalpracticeNoncurrent
children.description: The noncurrent portion of the receivable from insurance and similar arrangements for reimbursement and payment of malpractice claims and litigation costs.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: The amount receivable from insurance and similar arrangements for reimbursement and payment of malpractice claims and litigation costs.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseReceivable
children.description: Present value of lease payments not yet received by lessor and amount expected to be derived from underlying asset, following end of lease term guaranteed by lessee or other third party unrelated to lessor, from sales-type and direct financing leases.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OilAndGasJointInterestBillingReceivables
children.description: Amount of receivable from nonoperator partner in joint interest operation in oil- and gas-producing activities.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Carrying amounts due as of the balance sheet date of the sum of amounts receivable other than from customers.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherReceivables
OtherReceivableAfterAllowanceForCreditLossNoncurrent
children.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of receivable classified as other and noncurrent.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherReceivablesNetCurrent
children.description: Amount, after allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount due from parties in nontrade transactions, classified as other.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: CustomersLiabilityForAcceptancesNet
CustomersLiabilityForAcceptancesGross
children.description: Customer's outstanding debt to the institution that resulted from short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by an institution (also known as banker's acceptance transactions).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AllowanceForUncollectibleCustomersLiabilityForAcceptances
children.description: Represents the reserve against amounts due from customers which are uncollectible or questionable as to collection and which specifically relate to short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by an institution (also known banker's acceptances).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: The aggregate of all customer's outstanding debt to the institution that resulted from short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by an institution (also known as banker's acceptance transactions), net of allowance for uncollectible customer's liability for acceptances.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ReinsuranceRecoverables
PrepaidReinsurancePremiums
children.description: The unexpired portion of premiums ceded on policies in force as of the balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidAndUnpaidLosses
ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLosses
ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLossesGross
children.description: Amount before valuation allowance of reinsurance recoverables on paid losses.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLossesAllowance
children.description: Amount of valuation allowance for reinsurance recoverables on paid losses.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to and paid by the ceding insurer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ReinsuranceRecoverableForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustments
ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnUnpaidLossesGross
children.description: Amount before valuation allowance of reinsurance recoverables for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid, and for amounts expected based upon statistical projections and other measures of incurred losses and loss settlement expenses which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnUnpaidLossesAllowance
children.description: Amount of valuation allowance for reinsurance recoverables for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid, and for amounts expected based upon statistical projections and other measures of incurred losses and loss settlement expenses which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid and amounts expected for incurred losses and settlement expenses, which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, policy benefits and policy reserves. Excludes premiums paid under reinsurance contracts.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ContractWithCustomerAssetNet
children.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: CapitalizedContractCostNet
CapitalizedContractCostNetCurrent
children.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer; classified as current.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: CapitalizedContractCostNetNoncurrent
children.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer; classified as noncurrent.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: FundsHeldUnderReinsuranceAgreementsAsset
children.description: Amount of the reinsurer's funds held on its behalf by the ceding insurer, including funds held in trust, under reinsurance treaties or contracts with the assuming insurer as security for the payment of the obligations thereunder.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA
children.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: InventoryRealEstate
children.description: Total of (1) improvements, (2) held-for-sale, (3) land and land under development, (4) construction-in-process, (5) mortgage loans held-in-inventory, and (6) other real estate investments which are considered inventory due to being held for sale or disposition.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherRealEstateAndForeclosedAssets
ForeclosedAssets
RealEstateAcquiredThroughForeclosure
children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of land and buildings obtained through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherForeclosedAssets
children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of assets other than real property that were received in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of all assets obtained in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance; includes real and personal property; equity interests in corporations, partnerships, and joint ventures; and beneficial interests in trusts.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherRealEstate
OtherRealEstateCovered
children.description: Carrying amount of other real estate covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherRealEstateNonCovered
children.description: Carrying amount of other real estate not covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Carrying amount of other real estate not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. This does not include real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of other real estate and foreclosed assets. Other real estate may include real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. Foreclosed assets include all assets obtained in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: Investments
MarketableSecurities
children.description: Amount of investment in marketable security.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: TradingSecurities
TradingSecuritiesDebt
children.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: EquitySecuritiesFvNiCurrentAndNoncurrent
children.description: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWithoutSingleMaturityDateFairValue
children.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesSingleMaturityDate
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWithinOneYearFairValue
children.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAfterOneThroughFiveYearsFairValue
children.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAfterFiveThroughTenYearsFairValue
children.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAfterTenYearsFairValue
children.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAmortizedCostAfterAllowanceForCreditLoss
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesSingleMaturityDateAmortizedCostBasis
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWithinOneYearNetCarryingAmount
children.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAfterOneThroughFiveYearsNetCarryingAmount
children.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAfterFiveThroughTenYearsNetCarryingAmount
children.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAfterTenYearsNetCarryingAmount
children.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWithoutSingleMaturityDateNetCarryingAmount
children.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherInvestmentsAndSecuritiesAtCost
children.description: Includes other investments and securities that are not at fair value as of the balance sheet date and those that are not accounted for under the equity method.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: EquityMethodInvestments
children.description: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: LifeInsuranceCorporateOrBankOwnedAmount
children.description: This item represents the amount that could be realized under a life insurance contract or contracts owned by the Entity as of the date of the statement of financial position. Such Entity-owned life insurance policies are commonly known as corporate-owned life insurance (COLI) or bank-owned life insurance (BOLI).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherInvestments
children.description: Amount of investments classified as other.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all investments.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: RealEstateInvestments
RealEstateHeldForDevelopmentAndSaleNet
RealEstateAssetsHeldForDevelopmentAndSale
RealEstateHeldForDevelopmentAndSale
AssetsOfWhollyOwnedRealEstateInvestmentSubsidiaries
children.description: For banks, amount of real estate assets held by entities that are wholly-owned.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: RealEstateHeldForDevelopmentAndSaleSubsidiary
children.description: For banks, amount of real estate assets held for development or resale by subsidiary entities which hold such assets in the course of business.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: For banks, amount of real estate assets held for development or sale by the consolidated entity.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: RealEstateInvestmentSubsidiariesCashAndOtherAssets
children.description: For banks, amount of assets of real estate investments of a financial institution which are not land, buildings, or leasehold improvements.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: For banks, the total amount of real estate assets held for development and sale.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: RealEstateLiabilitiesAssociatedWithAssetsHeldForDevelopmentAndSale
RealEstateVariableInterestEntityBorrowings
children.description: For banks, amount of liabilities in variable interest entities for which a financial institution is required to include in its calculation of net investment in real estate assets held for development or sale.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: RealEstateSubsidiaryLiabilities
children.description: For banks, amount of liabilities for which a financial institution is required to include in its calculation of net investment in real estate assets held for development or sale.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: For banks, amount of all liabilities for which a financial institution is required to include in its calculation of net investment in real estate assets held for development or sale.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: MinorityInterestInJointVentures
children.description: Carrying amount of the equity interests owned by noncontrolling shareholders, partners, or other equity holders in joint ventures included in the entity's consolidated financial statements.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: For banks, amount of real estate assets held for development or sale, net of associated liabilities.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount of real estate investments, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; (7) other real estate investments; (8) real estate joint ventures; and (9) unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet
children.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: RealEstateHeldforsale
LandAvailableForSale
children.description: Amount of investment in land held for sale.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount of investment in land and building held for sale. Excludes real estate considered inventory.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: MembershipsInExchangesOwned
children.description: Amount of capitalized cost for obtaining membership with right to do business on trading exchange.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmountCoveredAndNotCovered
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmountCovered
LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmountCovered
children.description: Aggregate gross carrying amount of loans and leases receivable covered by loss sharing agreements.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowanceCovered
children.description: Amount of allowance for loan and lease losses covered by loss sharing agreements.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Net carrying amount of loans and leases receivable covered by loss sharing agreements.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums over and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: InterestsContinuedToBeHeldByTransferorFairValue
children.description: The carrying amount (fair value) as of the balance sheet date of the transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (typically securitized receivables, generally not involved in the collection of principal) following transfer of significant portions of such financial instruments to other parties. Such interests could be ancillary cash flows and interest-only strips.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ServicingAsset
ServicingAssetAtFairValueAmount
children.description: Fair value of an asset representing net future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues, in excess of future costs related to servicing arrangements.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValue

children.name: DeferredCostsLeasingNet

children.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, this element represents costs incurred by the lessor that are (a) costs to originate a lease incurred in transactions with independent third parties that (i) result directly from and are essential to acquire that lease and (ii) would not have been incurred had that leasing transaction not occurred and (b) certain costs directly related to specified activities performed by the lessor for that lease.
