children.name: OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurrent
children.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date, including liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received, taxes, interest, rent and utilities, compensation costs, payroll taxes and fringe benefits (other than pension and postretirement obligations), contractual rights and obligations, and statutory obligations.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DeferredRevenue
ContractWithCustomerLiability
children.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DeferredIncome
children.description: Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: UnrecognizedTaxBenefits
children.description: Amount of unrecognized tax benefits.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AccruedLiabilitiesForCommissionsExpenseAndTaxes
children.description: The carrying amount for commissions, taxes and other expenses that were incurred but unpaid as of the balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingencies
AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesDiscount
children.description: Amount of imputed interest necessary to reduce (reconcile) the undiscounted amount of the accrual for environmental loss contingencies to the present value.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesGross
AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesUndiscountedDueWithinOneYear
children.description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesUndiscountedDueInSecondYear
children.description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesUndiscountedDueInThirdYear
children.description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesUndiscountedDueInFourthYear
children.description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesUndiscountedDueInFifthYear
children.description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingenciesUndiscountedDueAfterFifthYear
children.description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Undiscounted amount of the accrual for environmental loss contingencies.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Total costs accrued as of the balance sheet date for environmental loss contingencies.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AdvancePaymentsByBorrowersForTaxesAndInsurance
children.description: Carrying amount of accumulated prepayments received by financial institutions from borrowers for taxes (for example, property taxes) and insurance (for example, property and catastrophe) which will periodically be remitted to the appropriate governmental agency or vendor on behalf of the borrower.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: UnearnedPremiums
children.description: Carrying amount of premiums written on insurance contracts that have not been earned as of the balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ServicingLiability
ServicingLiabilityAtFairValueAmount
children.description: Fair value of a liability representing servicing arrangements under which the estimated future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ServicingLiabilityAtAmortizedValueBalance
children.description: Amortized amount of contract to service financial assets under which estimated future revenues from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenue are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer for performing the servicing.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Aggregate amount of servicing liabilities that are subsequently measured at fair value and servicing liabilities that are subsequently measured using the amortization method.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: AdvanceRent
children.description: Amount at the balance sheet date that has been received by the entity that represents rents paid in advance.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DeferredGainOnSaleOfProperty
children.description: Amount of gain on the sale of property that does not qualify for gain recognition as of the balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DeferredLongTermLiabilityCharges
children.description: The total amount of long-term liability charges that are being deferred beyond one year.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DeferredRentCredit
children.description: Amount of excess of rental payment required by lease over rental income recognized.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DeferredCompensationLiabilityCurrentAndNoncurrent
DeferredCompensationSharebasedArrangementsLiabilityCurrentAndNoncurrent
DeferredCompensationShareBasedArrangementsLiabilityCurrent
children.description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for stock option plans and other equity-based compensation arrangements payable within one year (or the operating cycle, if longer).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DeferredCompensationSharebasedArrangementsLiabilityClassifiedNoncurrent
children.description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for stock option plans and other equity-based compensation arrangements payable after one year (or the operating cycle, if longer).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for stock option plans and other equity-based compensation arrangements.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DeferredCompensationCashbasedArrangementsLiabilityCurrentAndNoncurrent
DeferredCompensationCashbasedArrangementsLiabilityClassifiedNoncurrent
children.description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for deferred compensation arrangements payable after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Represents currently earned compensation under cash arrangements (such as a profit-sharing plan, rabbi trust, and employee contract--excluding equity-based arrangements) that is not actually paid until a later date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DeferredCompensationCashBasedArrangementsLiabilityCurrent
children.description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for deferred compensation arrangements payable within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Represents currently earned compensation under cash arrangements (such as a profit-sharing plan, rabbi trust, and employee contract--excluding equity-based arrangements) that is not actually paid until a later date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for deferred compensation arrangements. Represents currently earned compensation under cash arrangements (such as a profit-sharing plan, rabbi trust, and employee contract--excluding equity-based arrangements) that is not actually paid until a later date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherDeferredCompensationArrangementsLiabilityCurrentAndNoncurrent
OtherDeferredCompensationArrangementsLiabilityClassifiedNoncurrent
children.description: Amount of the liabilities, classified as other, for deferred compensation arrangements payable after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherDeferredCompensationArrangementsLiabilityCurrent
children.description: Amount of the liabilities, classified as other, for deferred compensation arrangements payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount of the liabilities for deferred compensation arrangements classified as other.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for all deferred compensation arrangements. Represents currently earned compensation under compensation arrangements that is not actually paid until a later date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: PensionAndOtherPostretirementAndPostemploymentBenefitPlansLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurrent
PostemploymentBenefitsLiabilityCurrentAndNoncurrent
PostemploymentBenefitsLiabilityCurrent
children.description: For a classified balance sheet, the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the portion of the obligations recognized for the various benefits provided to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement that is payable within one year of the balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: PostemploymentBenefitsLiabilityNoncurrent
children.description: For a classified balance sheet, the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the portion of the obligations recognized for the various benefits provided to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement that is payable after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the obligations recognized for the various benefits provided to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: PensionAndOtherPostretirementDefinedBenefitPlansLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurrent
DefinedBenefitPensionPlanCurrentAndNoncurrentLiabilities
DefinedBenefitPensionPlanLiabilitiesCurrent
children.description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension plan, classified as current. Excludes other postretirement benefit plan.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DefinedBenefitPensionPlanLiabilitiesNoncurrent
children.description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension plan, classified as noncurrent. Excludes other postretirement benefit plan.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension plan. Excludes other postretirement benefit plan.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherPostretirementDefinedBenefitPlanLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurrent
children.description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit other postretirement plan. Excludes pension plan.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherPostretirementBenefitsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent
children.description: Amount of liability for retirement benefits, classified as other.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for pension, other postretirement and postemployment benefits.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: SeparateAccountsLiability
children.description: Amount of liability for variable contract in which all or portion of contract holder's funds is allocated to specific separate account and supported by assets held in separate account.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: LitigationReserve
children.description: Aggregate carrying amount of the estimated litigation liability for known or estimated probable loss from litigation, which may include attorneys' fees and other litigation costs.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: SelfInsuranceReserve
children.description: Carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions) of accrued known and estimated losses incurred as of the balance sheet date for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: SecurityDepositLiability
children.description: This element represents money paid in advance to protect the provider of a product or service, such as a lessor, against damage or nonpayment by the buyer or tenant (lessee) during the term of the agreement. Such damages may include physical damage to the property, theft of property, and other contractual breaches. Security deposits held may be interest or noninterest bearing.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: RestructuringReserve
RestructuringReserveCurrent
children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of known and estimated obligations associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructurings pursuant to a duly authorized plan, which are expected to be paid in the next twelve months or in the normal operating cycle if longer. Costs of such activities include those for one-time termination benefits, termination of an operating lease or other contract, consolidating or closing facilities, relocating employees, and costs associated with an ongoing benefit arrangement, but excludes costs associated with the retirement of a long-lived asset.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: RestructuringReserveNoncurrent
children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of known and estimated costs associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructurings pursuant to a duly authorized plan, which are expected to be paid after one year or beyond the next operating cycle, if longer. Costs of such activities include those for one-time termination benefits, termination of an operating lease or other contract, consolidating or closing facilities, and relocating employees, and costs associated with an ongoing benefit arrangement, but excludes costs associated with the retirement of a long-lived asset.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions of the accrual) as of the balance sheet date pertaining to a specified type of cost associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructuring pursuant to a duly authorized plan.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OffMarketLeaseUnfavorable
children.description: This element represents a liability associated with the acquisition of an off-market lease when the terms of the lease are unfavorable to the market terms for the lease at the date of acquisition.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: LeaseDepositLiability
children.description: Amount of liability for lease payments received, including variable lease payments, when collectability is not probable at commencement date for sales-type lease.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations
DebtLongtermAndShorttermCombinedAmount
ShortTermBorrowings
children.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: LongTermDebt
SecuredDebt
SecuredDebtCurrent
children.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term, collateralized debt obligations due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer. Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: SecuredLongTermDebt
children.description: Carrying amount of collateralized debt obligations with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer, excluding the current portion. Obligations include, but not limited to, mortgage loans, chattel loans, and other borrowings secured by assets.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: UnsecuredDebt
UnsecuredDebtCurrent
children.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term, uncollateralized debt obligations due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: UnsecuredLongTermDebt
children.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: SubordinatedDebt
SubordinatedDebtCurrent
children.description: The portion of the carrying value of subordinated debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle, if longer. Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: SubordinatedLongTermDebt
children.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of collateralized/uncollateralized debt obligation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion. Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind the primary lender of the company.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of subordinated debt (with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ConvertibleDebt
ConvertibleDebtCurrent
children.description: The portion of the carrying value of long-term convertible debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle if longer. Convertible debt is a financial instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ConvertibleDebtNoncurrent
children.description: Carrying amount of long-term convertible debt as of the balance sheet date, net of the amount due in the next twelve months or greater than the normal operating cycle, if longer. The debt is convertible into another form of financial instrument, typically the entity's common stock.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying amount of debt identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument (typically the entity's common stock) as of the balance sheet date, which originally required full repayment more than twelve months after issuance or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ConvertibleSubordinatedDebt
ConvertibleSubordinatedDebtCurrent
children.description: The portion of the carrying value of convertible subordinated debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle if longer. This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment upon liquidation of the entity's assets.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ConvertibleSubordinatedDebtNoncurrent
children.description: The portion of the carrying value of convertible subordinated debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer. This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, the carrying value of convertible subordinated debt, as of the balance sheet date, initially scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer. This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: JuniorSubordinatedDebentureOwedToUnconsolidatedSubsidiaryTrust
JuniorSubordinatedDebentureOwedToUnconsolidatedSubsidiaryTrustCurrent
children.description: The current portion of the carrying value of junior subordinated long-term debt owed to unconsolidated subsidiary trusts as of the balance sheet date. Such debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets and was initially scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: JuniorSubordinatedDebentureOwedToUnconsolidatedSubsidiaryTrustNoncurrent
children.description: The noncurrent portion of the carrying value of junior subordinated long-term debt owed to unconsolidated subsidiary trusts as of the balance sheet date. Such debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets and was initially scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, the carrying value of junior subordinated long-term debt owed to unconsolidated subsidiary trusts as of the balance sheet date. Such debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets and was initially scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: LineOfCredit
LinesOfCreditCurrent
children.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current portion of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: LongTermLineOfCredit
children.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the noncurrent portion of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current and noncurrent portions of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: LongtermCommercialPaperCurrentAndNoncurrent
LongTermCommercialPaperCurrent
children.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current portion of long-term unsecured obligations issued by corporations and other borrowers to investors (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: CommercialPaperNoncurrent
children.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term unsecured obligations issued by corporations and other borrowers to investors (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term unsecured obligations issued by corporations and other borrowers to investors (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: LongtermTransitionBondCurrentAndNoncurrent
LongtermTransitionBondCurrent
children.description: Long-Term transition bonds are bonds under the Competition Act in which the proceeds of Transition Bonds are required to be used principally to reduce qualified stranded costs and the related capitalization of the utility. This represents the current portion.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: LongTermTransitionBond
children.description: Long-Term transition bonds are bonds under the Competition Act in which the proceeds of Transition Bonds are required to be used principally to reduce qualified stranded costs and the related capitalization of the utility. This represents the noncurrent portion.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Long-Term transition bonds are bonds under the Competition Act in which the proceeds of Transition Bonds are required to be used principally to reduce qualified stranded costs and the related capitalization of the utility. This represents the current and noncurrent portions. The initial maturity is beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: LongtermConstructionLoanCurrentAndNoncurrent
LongTermConstructionLoanCurrent
children.description: This element represents the current portion of a long-term real estate loan to finance building costs. The funds are disbursed as needed or in accordance with a prearranged plan; generally, a portion of the funds is disbursed at inception and the remainder as construction progresses. The money is repaid on completion of the project (generally one to seven years), usually from the proceeds of a mortgage loan. The rate is normally higher than the prime rate, and there is usually an origination fee. The effective yield on these loans tends to be high, and the lender has a security interest in the real property.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: ConstructionLoanNoncurrent
children.description: This element represents the noncurrent portion of a long-term real estate loan to finance building costs. The funds are disbursed as needed or in accordance with a prearranged plan; generally, a portion of the funds is disbursed at inception and the remainder as construction progresses. The money is repaid on completion of the project (generally one to seven years), usually from the proceeds of a mortgage loan. The rate is normally higher than the prime rate, and there is usually an origination fee. The effective yield on these loans tends to be high, and the lender has a security interest in the real property.
children.disclosure: 108000 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.description: This element represents the current and noncurrent portions of a long-term real estate loan with an initial maturity beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer, to finance building costs. The money is repaid on completion of the project (generally one to seven years), usually from the proceeds of a mortgage loan. The rate is normally higher than the prime rate, and there is usually an origination fee. The effective yield on these loans tends to be high, and the lender has a security interest in the real property.

children.name: SpecialAssessmentBond
SpecialAssessmentBondCurrent
children.description: The current portion of the carrying value as of the balance sheet date of a type of municipal bond typically used to fund a development project. Also called special assessment limited liability bond, special district bond, special purpose bond, special tax bond and community development obligation. Interest owed to lenders is paid by taxes levied on the community benefiting from the particular bond-funded project. For example, if a bond of this sort was issued to pay for sidewalks to be repaved in a certain community, an additional tax would be levied on homeowners in the area benefiting from this project.

164000 - Statement - Statement of Cash F.name: CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecreaseExcludingExchangeRateEffect

children.name: CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecreaseExcludingExchangeRateEffectContinuingOperations
children.description: Amount, excluding effect from change in exchange rate, of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalent, and cash and cash equivalent restricted to withdrawal or usage; attributable to continuing operation. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.
children.disclosure: 164000 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Insurance Based Operations

children.name: CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecreaseExcludingExchangeRateEffectDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperations
children.description: Amount, excluding effect from change in exchange rate, of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalent, and cash and cash equivalent restricted to withdrawal or usage; attributable to discontinued operation. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.
children.disclosure: 164000 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Insurance Based Operations

164000 - Statement - Statement of Cash F.description: Amount, excluding effect from change in exchange rate, of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalent, and cash and cash equivalent restricted to withdrawal or usage; including, but not limited to, discontinued operation. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.
164000 - Statement - Statement of Cash F.disclosure: 164000 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Insurance Based Operations

children.description: Amount paid to managing member or general partner, affiliate of managing member or general partner, or affiliate of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP) for administrative services provided to the LLC or LP, for example, but not limited to, salaries, rent, or overhead costs.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentForIncentiveFee
children.description: Amount paid for incentive rights held by the managing member or general partner, of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentForManagementFee
children.description: Amount paid to managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.description: Amount of cash outflow for fees classified as other.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForCommissions
children.description: The amount of cash paid for commissions during the current period.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForBrokerageFees
children.description: The amount of cash paid for brokerage fees during the current period. This element is intended to represent the brokerage fees paid by and between financial industry participants.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForRoyalties
children.description: The amount of cash paid for royalties during the current period.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForLegalSettlements
children.description: The amount of cash paid for the settlement of litigation or for other legal issues during the period.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForEnvironmentalLiabilities
children.description: Cash outflows made during the period for environmental remediation activities.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForReinsurance
children.description: Cash payments made for reinsurance during the current period.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpense
children.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle insured claims and pay costs incurred in the claims settlement process.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForUnderwritingExpense
children.description: Cash paid for expenses incurred during underwriting activities (the process to review insurance applications, evaluate risks, accept or reject applications, and determine the premiums to be charged) for insurance companies.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForMergerRelatedCosts
children.description: The amount of cash paid during the reporting period for charges associated with the mergers.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForRestructuring
children.description: Amount of cash payments made as the result of exit or disposal activities. Excludes payments associated with a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForPurchaseOfSecuritiesOperatingActivities
children.description: Cash paid to purchase debt and equity securities, classified as operating activities, during the period; includes trading securities and any other investments classified as operating.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForPurchaseOfOtherAssets1
children.description: Amount of cash paid to purchase other assets as part of operating activities.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForDepositsWithOtherInstitutions
children.description: Cash paid to make deposits at other institutions during the period.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForTimeDeposits
children.description: Cash paid to customers who withdraw money in checking and similar accounts at a financial institution.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForLoans
children.description: Cash payments for and related to principal collection on loans related to operating activities.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForOriginationAndPurchasesOfLoansHeldForSale
PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHeldForSale
children.description: The amount of cash paid for the origination of mortgages that are held for sale.

children.name: PaymentsToPurchaseLoansHeldForSale
PaymentsToPurchaseMortgageLoansHeldForSale
children.description: The cash outflow used to purchase loans that are secured with real estate mortgage and are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

children.name: PaymentsToPurchaseOtherLoansHeldForSale
children.description: The cash outflow used to purchase loans (other than mortgage loans) that are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

children.description: The aggregate cash outflow used to purchase all loans that are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

children.description: The aggregate amount of cash outflow for loans purchased and created with the intention to resell them in the near future.

children.name: PensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitContributions
PensionContributions
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for pension benefit. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution to fund plan asset and payment to retiree. Excludes other postretirement benefit.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: OtherPostretirementBenefitsPayments
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for other postretirement benefit. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution to fund plan asset and payment to retiree. Excludes pension benefit.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.description: Amount of cash outflow for pension and other postretirement benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution to fund plan asset and payment to retiree.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForPostemploymentBenefits
children.description: Cash outflows for payments of postemployment benefits (such as severance pay and health insurance benefits) recognized during the period. Postemployment benefits are benefits paid to employees after employment but before retirement.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: AssetRetirementObligationCashPaidToSettle
children.description: Amount of cash paid during the period to settle an asset retirement obligation. Amounts paid to settle an asset retirement obligation are generally included in the operating section of the Statement of Cash Flows.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabilityOperatingActivities
children.description: Amount of cash outflow, not made soon after acquisition date of business combination, to settle contingent consideration liability exceeding amount recognized at acquisition date. Includes, but is not limited to, measurement period adjustment and less amount paid soon after acquisition date.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicyOperatingActivities
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as operating activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: PaymentsForOtherOperatingActivities
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for operating activity, classified as other.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: ShortTermLeasePayments
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for short-term lease payment excluded from lease liability.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: VariableLeasePayment
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for variable lease payment excluded from lease liability.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: FinanceLeaseInterestPaymentOnLiability
children.description: Amount of interest paid on finance lease liability.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: OperatingLeasePayments
children.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.description: Total amount of cash paid for operating activities during the current period.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activity attributable to continuing operation. Operating activity includes, but is not limited to, transaction, adjustment, and change in value not defined as investing or financing activity.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

children.name: CashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations
children.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activity attributable to discontinued operation. Operating activity includes, but is not limited to, transaction, adjustment, and change in value not defined as investing or financing activity.
children.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash F.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activity, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation. Operating activity includes, but is not limited to, transaction, adjustment, and change in value not defined as investing or financing activity.
172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash F.disclosure: 172600 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Direct Method Operating Activities

500000 - Disclosure - Equity.description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

children.name: PreferredStockIncludingAdditionalPaidInCapital
PreferredStockValue
children.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.
children.disclosure: 500000 - Disclosure - Equity

children.name: AdditionalPaidInCapitalPreferredStock
children.description: Value received from shareholder in nonredeemable preferred stock-related transaction in excess of par value, value contributed to entity and value received from other stock-related transaction. Includes, but is not limited to, preferred stock redeemable solely at option of issuer. Excludes common stock.
children.disclosure: 500000 - Disclosure - Equity

children.description: Aggregate issuance value of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued and outstanding.
children.disclosure: 500000 - Disclosure - Equity

children.name: PreferredStockDiscountOnShares
children.description: Discount on preferred shares, or any unamortized balance thereof, shown separately as a deduction from the applicable account(s) as circumstances require.
children.disclosure: 500000 - Disclosure - Equity

500000 - Disclosure - Equity.description: Aggregate par value plus amounts in excess of par or issuance value (in cases of no-par value stock) for nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued and outstanding, net of discount on shares. Aggregate for preferred stock issued and outstanding.

children.name: StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmountAvailableForDividendPaymentsWithRegulatoryApproval

children.description: Amount of dividends that can be declared or paid without approval of regulatory agency.

500000 - Disclosure - Equity.name: CommonStocksIncludingAdditionalPaidInCapitalNetOfDiscount

children.name: CommonStocksIncludingAdditionalPaidInCapital
children.description: Amount of par value plus amounts in excess of par value or issuance value for common stock issued.
children.disclosure: 500000 - Disclosure - Equity

children.name: CommonStockDiscountOnShares
children.description: Discount on common shares, or any unamortized balance thereof, shown separately as a deduction from the applicable account(s) as circumstances require.
children.disclosure: 500000 - Disclosure - Equity

500000 - Disclosure - Equity.description: Amount after discount on shares of par value plus amounts in excess of par value or issuance value for common stock held by shareholders. Includes common stock repurchased and held as treasury stock.

children.name: AociLiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitExpectedNetPremiumBeforeTax
children.description: Amount, before tax, of accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) (AOCI) from increase (decrease) in expected net premium component of liability for future policy benefit from change in discount rate.

children.name: AociLiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitExpectedFuturePolicyBenefitBeforeTax
children.description: Amount, before tax, of accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) (AOCI) from (increase) decrease in expected future policy benefit component of liability for future policy benefit from change in discount rate.
children.disclosure: 500000 - Disclosure - Equity

500000 - Disclosure - Equity.description: Amount, before tax, of accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) (AOCI) from (increase) decrease in liability for future policy benefit from change in discount rate.

124000 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: NoninterestIncome

children.name: RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax
children.description: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

124000 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: The total amount of noninterest income which may be derived from: (1) fees and commissions; (2) premiums earned; (3) insurance policy charges; (4) the sale or disposal of assets; and (5) other sources not otherwise specified.
124000 - Statement - Statement of Income.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.description: Amount of current federal, state, and local tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. DeferredFederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit
children.description: Amount of deferred federal tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, deferred national tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

children.name: DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit
children.description: Amount of deferred state and local tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, deferred regional, territorial, and provincial tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

children.description: Amount of deferred federal, state, and local tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, deferred national, regional, territorial, and provincial tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

124000 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount of current and deferred federal, state, and local tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, current and deferred national, regional, territorial, and provincial tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

NetIncomeLoss

children.description: Amount of operating lease income from lease payments and variable lease payments paid and payable to lessor. Includes, but is not limited to, variable lease payments not included in measurement of lease receivable.

children.name: InsuranceCommissionsAndFees
children.description: Income from agency and brokerage operations (includes sales of annuities and supplemental contracts); service charges, commissions, and fees from the sale of insurance and related services; and management fees from separate accounts, deferred annuities, and universal life products.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: ContractuallySpecifiedServicingFeesLateFeesAndAncillaryFeesEarnedInExchangeForServicingFinancialAssets
ContractuallySpecifiedServicingFeesAmount
children.description: All amounts that, per contract, are due to the servicer in exchange for servicing the financial asset and would no longer be received by a servicer if the beneficial owners of the serviced assets (or their trustees or agents) were to exercise their actual or potential authority under the contract to shift the servicing to another servicer. Depending on the servicing contract, those fees may include some or all of the difference between the interest rate collected on the asset being serviced and the rate to be paid to the beneficial owners of the asset.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: LateFeeIncomeGeneratedByServicingFinancialAssetsAmount
children.description: All amounts that are due to the servicer of a financial asset as a result of the debt holder not meeting the monthly payment terms.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: AncillaryFeeIncomeGeneratedByServicingFinancialAssetsAmount
children.description: All amounts that are due to the servicer of a financial asset, excluding contractually specified servicing fees and late fees.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.description: Amount of contractually specified servicing fee, late fee, and ancillary fee recognized as income for servicing asset and servicing liability.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: InsuranceAgencyManagementFee
children.description: Fees earned during the period for providing management services.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: GainsLossesOnSalesOfAssets
GainLossOnSecuritizationOfFinancialAssets
children.description: A gain (loss) realized on a transfer, accounted for as a sale, of all or a portion of financial assets in which the transferor surrenders control and receives consideration other than a beneficial interest in the assets transferred. Reflects the amount of sales proceeds in excess of, or deficient from, the sum of the carrying amounts of transferred financial assets plus transaction costs.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: DebtAndEquitySecuritiesRealizedGainLoss
DebtSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss
DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedGainLoss
children.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

children.name: DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGainLoss
children.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

children.name: HeldtomaturitySecuritiesSoldSecurityRealizedGainLossExcludingOtherThanTemporaryImpairments
children.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) from sale of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

children.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

children.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet
GainLossOnSalesOfConsumerLoans
children.description: The gains (losses) included in earning that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of consumer loans. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: GainLossOnSaleOfMortgageLoans
children.description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of loans made to finance real estate acquisitions. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from a sale of loans, including adjustments to record loans classified as held-for-sale at the lower-of-cost-or-market and fair value adjustments to loan held for investment purposes.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: GainLossOnSalesOfMortgageBackedSecuritiesMBS
children.description: Net gain (loss) resulting from the sales of securitized, pay-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans (mortgages).
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: GainLossOnSaleOfInsuranceBlock
children.description: Excess (deficiency) of net proceeds received over the net carrying value of a certain, bundled grouping of insurance policies.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: GainLossOnSaleOfDerivatives
children.description: The difference between the book value and the sale price of options, swaps, futures, forward contracts, and other derivative instruments. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: GainsLossesOnSalesOfCreditCardPortfolio
children.description: The gain (loss) resulting from the sale of credit card receivables (portfolios).
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: GainLossOnDispositionOfOtherFinancialAssets
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) on disposal of other assets utilized in financial service operations.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets utilized in financial service operations.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: PremiumsEarnedNet
children.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

children.description: Amount of interest and fee income from loans held-for-sale and classified as other.

InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansCommercial
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansCommercialIndustrialAndAgriculturalLoans
children.description: Interest and fee income generated from all commercial, industrial, and agricultural loans.

children.name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansCommercialAndResidentialRealEstate
children.description: Interest and fee income from commercial and residential real estate loans.

children.name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansCommercialRealEstate
children.description: Interest and fee income generated from loans secured by commercial properties. Examples of properties commonly securing commercial real estate loans may include office buildings, apartment buildings, shopping centers, industrial property, and hotels.

children.name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansRealEstateConstruction
children.description: Interest and fee income from loans used for real estate development and construction costs. Such loans are referred to as "Construction" loans or mortgages.

children.name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansTradeFinancing
children.description: Interest and fee income generated by trade financing. Trade financing is a specialized area of commercial lending frequently used by businesses that engage in international activities. Such financing includes open account financing, sales on consignment, documentary collections, advances against collections, letters of credit, bankers' acceptances, factoring, and forfeiting.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansLeaseFinancing
children.description: Interest and fee income generated by direct lease financing which consists of an institution owning and leasing personal property for the use of its customers at the customers' specific request.

children.description: Interest and fee income related to commercial loans including industrial and agricultural, real estate (commercial and residential, construction and development), trade financing, and lease financing.
children.disclosure: 124000 - Statement - Statement of Income (Including Gross Margin)

children.name: InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansConsumer
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansConsumerRealEstate
