children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInInventoriesAndOtherOperatingAssets
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in inventory, and assets classified as other.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentAssets
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in current assets classified as other.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentAssets
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent assets classified as other.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInMortgageLoansHeldForSale
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in value of mortgage loan held with intention to sell or be securitized in near future.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of assets used to generate operating income.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInOperatingLiabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLiability
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableTrade
children.description: Change in recurring obligations of a business that arise from the acquisition of merchandise, materials, supplies and services used in the production and sale of goods and services.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInNotesPayableCurrent
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in current portion (due within one year or one business cycle) of obligations evidenced by formal promissory notes.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesToBrokerDealers
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations incurred arising from transactions with broker-dealers, such as amounts due on margin and unsettled cash transactions; includes payables to brokers, dealers and clearing organizations.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesToCustomers
children.description: The change during the period, either increase or decrease, in amounts payable to customers. The term customers generally excludes other broker-dealers; persons who are principal officers, directors, and stockholders; and persons whose securities or funds are part of the regulatory net capital of the broker-dealer. Another broker-dealer's account can be classified as a customer if the account is carried as an omnibus account in compliance with certain regulations. The accounts of principal officers, directors and stockholders may be combined in the customer captions if they are not material and the combination is disclosed in the oath that is required to accompany the annual audited FOCUS Report.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueToRelatedPartiesCurrent
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableRelatedParties
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligations due for goods and services provided by the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries, subsidiaries of a common parent, an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entities' management, an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInNotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrent
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the current portion (due within one year or one business cycle, whichever is longer) of the amount owed by the reporting entity in the form of loans and obligations (generally evidenced by promissory notes) made by the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families; affiliates; or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueToOfficersAndStockholdersCurrent
children.description: The increase (decrease) in current obligations (due within one year or one operating cycle) owed to reporting entity's executives and owners.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueToEmployeesCurrent
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in obligations due within one year (or one business cycle) to employees other than officers.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliatesCurrent
children.description: The increase (decrease) in current obligations (due within one year or one operating cycle) owed to an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInDueToOtherRelatedPartiesCurrent
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in related party payables classified as other, due within one year or operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations to be paid to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entities' management; an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInRoyaltiesPayable
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligations due for compensation payments related to the use of copyrights, patents, trade names, licenses, technology. Royalty payments are also paid by the lease holders for oil, gas, and mineral extraction.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInRetainagePayable
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in retainage obligations due by the reporting entity that are payable within one year (or one business cycle).
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayable
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligations classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of obligations, not classified as trade payables, incurred and payable for the acquisition of merchandise, materials, supplies, and services pertaining to construction projects.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInInterestPayableNet

children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInEmployeeRelatedLiabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedSalaries
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in accrued salaries.

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInWorkersCompensationLiabilities
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due for insurance (or actual expenses) to cover the medical expenses and lost income for employees that are injured during the course of doing work-related activities.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInPensionAndPostretirementObligations
IncreaseDecreaseInPensionPlanObligations
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation for pension benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, defined benefit or defined contribution plans. Excludes other postretirement benefits.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInPostretirementObligations
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation for other postretirement benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, defined benefit and defined contribution plans. Excludes pension benefits.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation for pension and other postretirement benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, defined benefit and defined contribution plans.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInPostemploymentObligations
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the current portion of the liability that represents various benefits due to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInPneumoconiosisBenefitObligationsNoncurrent
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due to fund payment obligations to former employees suffering from pneumoconiosis.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherEmployeeRelatedLiabilities
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in employer-related costs classified as other and current.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccruedLiabilities
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in other expenses incurred but not yet paid.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilities
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in other obligations or expenses incurred but not yet paid.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndOtherOperatingLiabilities
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligations incurred but not paid, and operating obligations classified as other.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInTradingLiabilities
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of trading liabilities from the reporting entity's trading activities. This include liabilities resulting from sales of assets that the reporting entity does not own and revaluation losses.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInFinancialInstrumentsSoldNotYetPurchased
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the liability Securities Sold, Not yet Purchased. Proprietary securities transactions entered into by the broker-dealer for trading or investment purposes are included in "Securities Owned and Securities Sold, Not Yet Purchased." Although proprietary trading is frequently thought of as purchasing securities for sale to others, trading securities for the broker-dealer's own account sometimes leads to a liability for the fair value of securities sold but not yet purchased, that is, sold short. The broker-dealer is then obliged to purchase the securities at a future date at the then-current market price.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInCashCollateralForLoanedSecurities
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of cash that is received as security when loaning securities.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseCashCollateralFromCounterparties
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of cash held either as collateral directly or provided to third parties associated with derivative instruments. Upon the occurrence of any specified triggering event or condition associated with the derivative, these amounts can be utilized to recover all or a portion of the amounts due or payable under the derivative.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInSecuritiesLoanedTransactions
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the liability arising from securities loaned transactions.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesUnderRepurchaseAgreements
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the liability under agreements to repurchase securities that were sold.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInInsuranceLiabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInLiabilityForClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExpenseReserve
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in liability to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before the balance sheet date, whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInLifeInsuranceLiabilities
children.description: The increase (decrease) in life insurance liability balances during the period.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInHealthCareInsuranceLiabilities
children.description: The increase (decrease) in health care insurance liability balances during the period.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInPropertyAndCasualtyInsuranceLiabilities
children.description: The increase (decrease) in property and casualty insurance liabilities balances during the period.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherInsuranceLiabilities
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in insurance liabilities classified as other.

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInReinsurancePayables
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due to other insurance companies when the reporting entity has assumed a portion of the cedant's insurance risk which has resulted in insurance losses.

children.description: The change in other policyholder funds recorded on the balance sheet, which is needed to adjust net income to arrive at net cash flows provided by or used in operations.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The increase (decrease) in insurance liability balances during the period.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredLiabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredCompensation
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligation created by employee agreements whereby earned compensation will be paid in the future.

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherDeferredLiability
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred obligations classified as other.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: Change during the period in carrying value for all deferred liabilities due within one year or operating cycle.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInSecurityDeposits
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in security deposits.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInDerivativeLiabilities
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying value of derivative instruments reported as liabilities that are due to be disposed of within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedIncomeTaxesPayable
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount due for taxes based on the reporting entity's earnings or attributable to the entity's income earning process (business presence) within a given jurisdiction.

children.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount of cash payments due to taxing authorities for non-income-related taxes.

children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInSelfInsuranceReserve
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount of accrued known and estimated losses incurred for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's' compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInRestructuringReserve
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions of the accrual) of the liability pertaining to the exit from or disposal of business activities or restructuring pursuant to a duly authorized plan, excluding costs or losses pertaining to an entity newly acquired in a business combination and to asset retirement obligations.

Another element, Increase (Decrease) in Outstanding Checks, Financing Activities, represents cash flows from outstanding checks classified as financing activities.

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInOverUnderEnergyRecovery
IncreaseDecreaseInOverEnergyRecovery
children.description: The change during the reporting period in the value of the asset created by an over recovery. An over recovery means that the basic energy product price based on the daily product price and exchange rate is less than the basic fuel price used in the calculation of the monthly retail energy product.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInUnderEnergyRecovery
children.description: The change during the reporting period in the value of the liability created by an under-recovery. An under-recovery means that the basic energy product price based on the daily product price and exchange rate is more than the basic fuel price used in the calculation of the monthly retail energy product.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of the asset or liability created by an over or under recovery. An over under-recovery means that the basic energy price based on the daily product price and exchange rate is less (over) or more (under) than the basic energy price used in the calculation of the monthly retail energy product.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInRegulatoryAssetsAndLiabilities

children.description: The cash outflow to obtain servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. Rights may be obtained via (1) acquisition or assumption of a servicing obligation that does not relate to financial assets of the servicer or its consolidated affiliates; or (2) by originating mortgage loans and then (a) transferring the loans to a Variable Interest Entity (VIE) in a transaction that meets the necessary transfer and classification requirements, or (b) transferring the loans in a transaction that meets the requirements for sale accounting.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageServicingRightsMSR
children.description: The cash inflow from the sale of servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. Rights may be obtained via (1) acquisition or assumption of a servicing obligation that does not relate to financial assets of the servicer or its consolidated affiliates; or (2) by originating mortgage loans and then (a) transferring the loans to a Variable Interest Entity (VIE) in a transaction that meets the necessary transfer and classification requirements, or (b) transferring the loans in a transaction that meets the requirements for sale accounting.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The net cash outflow or inflow associated with acquisition or sale of mortgage servicing rights which is the net carrying value of capitalized servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. Rights may be obtained via (1) acquisition or assumption of a servicing obligation that does not relate to financial assets of the servicer or its consolidated affiliates; or (2) by originating mortgage loans and then (a) transferring the loans to a Variable Interest Entity (VIE) in a transaction that meets the necessary transfer and classification requirements, or (b) transferring the loans in a transaction that meets the requirements for sale accounting.

children.description: The cash outflow associated with purchasing leases held for investment purposes during an accounting period.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsToAcquireOtherLoansAndLeasesHeldForInvestment
children.description: Amount of cash outflow from purchases of loans and leases held-for-investment classified as other.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The cash outflow from (a) purchases of loans held-for-investment, (b) purchases of leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromRecoveriesOfLoanPreviouslyChargedOff
children.description: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of financing receivable, previously written off.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherLoansAndLeases
children.description: The net cash outflow or inflow for other changes, net, in the loan and lease balances held for investment purposes that are not separately disclosed. Includes cash payments and proceeds associated with (a) loans held-for-investment, (b) leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The net cash outflow or inflow for the increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period of loan and lease balances which are not originated or purchased specifically for resale. Includes cash payments and proceeds associated with (a) loans held-for-investment, (b) leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForProceedsFromLifeInsurancePolicies
PaymentsToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicies
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromLifeInsurancePolicies
children.description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The net cash outflow or inflow for net proceeds and payments derived from carrying life insurance policies for which the entity is the beneficiary.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForProceedsFromRemovalCosts
ProceedsFromRemovalCosts
children.description: Cash inflow resulting from recoveries, by any means, against the cost of disposing of plant, whether by demolishing, dismantling, abandoning, sale, and so forth during the period.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForRemovalCosts
children.description: Cash outflow related to disposal costs of plants, whether by demolishing, dismantling, abandoning, sale, and so forth during the period.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the costs of disposing of plant, whether by demolishing, dismantling, abandoning, sale, and so forth during the period.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForProceedsFromNuclearFuel
ProceedsFromNuclearFuel
children.description: Cash inflow resulting from the sale of any material that is commonly used in the generation of nuclear energy.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForNuclearFuel
children.description: Cash outflow associated with the purchase of any material that is commonly used in the generation of nuclear energy.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from any material that is commonly used in the generation of nuclear energy.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromPaymentsForLongTermLoansForRelatedParties
ProceedsFromCollectionOfLongtermLoansToRelatedParties
children.description: The cash inflow associated with collection, whether partial or full, of long-term loans to a related party. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances to Affiliates.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsToFundLongtermLoansToRelatedParties
children.description: The cash outflow associated with extending a long-term loan to a related party. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances to Affiliates.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The cash inflow or outflow associated with long-term loans for related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party, including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from (Payments for) Advances to Affiliates.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForProceedsFromHedgeInvestingActivities
PaymentsForHedgeInvestingActivities
children.description: The cash outflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either a cash flow hedge, fair value hedge, or hedge of a net investment in a foreign operation.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromHedgeInvestingActivities
children.description: The cash inflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either a cash flow hedge, fair value hedge, or hedge of a net investment in a foreign operation.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The cash outflow or inflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either a cash flow hedge, fair value hedge, or hedge of a net investment in a foreign operation.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForProceedsFromDerivativeInstrumentInvestingActivities
PaymentsForDerivativeInstrumentInvestingActivities
children.description: The cash outflow for derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromDerivativeInstrumentInvestingActivities
children.description: The cash inflow provided by derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The net cash outflow or inflow from derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistributionsReturnOfCapital
children.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return of investment, classified as investing activities. Excludes distribution for return on investment, classified as operating activities.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromPaymentsForInInterestBearingDepositsInBanks
children.description: The net cash inflow or outflow in Interest-bearing Deposits by banks in other financial institutions for relatively short periods of time including, for example, certificates of deposits.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromSaleOfForeclosedAssets
children.description: The cash inflow from the sale assets received in full or partial satisfaction of a receivable including real and personal property; equity interests in corporations, partnerships, and joint ventures; and beneficial interests in trusts. Foreclosed assets also include loans that are treated as if the underlying collateral had been foreclosed because the institution has taken possession of the collateral, even though legal foreclosure or repossession proceedings have not taken place.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromSaleOfWhollyOwnedRealEstateAndRealEstateAcquiredInSettlementOfLoans
children.description: The cash inflow from proceeds From Sales of Wholly Owned Real Estate and Real Estate Acquired in Settlement of Loans.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseOfRestrictedInvestments
children.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with investments (not to include restricted cash) that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInCollateralHeldUnderSecuritiesLending
children.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount of assets, which may include but are not limited to cash and investments, received as collateral pertaining to securities loaned to a counterparty to the transaction. Includes the change during the period in any unrealized gain or loss on such investments.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInterestEarningAssets
children.description: The net cash outflow or inflow for the increase (decrease) in other interest earning assets not separately disclosed.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: OperatingLeasePaymentsUse
children.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromLeasePaymentSalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesInvestingActivity
children.description: Amount of cash inflow from principal payment received from sales-type and direct financing leases classified as investing activity.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForInvestmentInRestrictedCashFromPollutionControlBond
children.description: The cash outflow for investments in restricted cash from pollution control bond, which is a debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromDistributionOfRestrictedCashFromPollutionControlBond
children.description: The cash inflow from amounts received from distributions of restricted cash from pollution control bond, which is a debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromAdvancesForConstruction
children.description: Amount of cash inflow from advance for construction, classified as investing activity. Includes, but is not limited to, borrowing from developer, builder, government agency, and municipality.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfAdvancesForConstruction
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for repayment of advance for construction, classified as investing activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to developer, builder, government agency, and municipality for borrowing received in construction.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInLeaseAcquisitionCosts
children.description: The increase (decrease) in the balance of capitalized lease acquisition costs during the period. The cost usually covers a variety of administrative costs, such as the cost of obtaining a credit report, verifying insurance coverage, lease commission charges, checking the accuracy and completeness of the lease documentation, and entering the lease in data processing and accounting systems.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForLeasingCostsCommissionsAndTenantImprovements
PaymentsForLeasingCosts
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for costs that are essential to originate the lease and would not otherwise have been incurred without the lease agreement. Amount includes, but is not limited to, cash outflows to evaluate the lessee's credit condition, guarantees, and collateral and cash outflows for costs incurred in negotiating, processing, and executing the lease agreement.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForTenantImprovements
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for the allowance granted to lessee and/or direct costs incurred by lessor used to prepare the leased premises for tenant's occupancy.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForLeaseCommissions
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for lease commissions incurred.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: Net cash outflow for the allowance granted to lessee and/or direct costs incurred by lessor used to prepare the leased premises for tenant's occupancy; for costs that are essential to originating the lease and would not otherwise have been incurred without the lease agreement, including but not limited to, evaluating the lessee's credit condition, guarantees, and collateral and costs incurred in negotiating, processing, and executing the lease agreement; and for any commission(s) incurred.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForProceedsFromDepositsOnRealEstateAcquisitions
children.description: Net cash outflow or inflow from the amount given in advance to show intention to complete the acquisition piece of land, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromContributionInAidOfConstruction
children.description: Amount of cash inflow from contribution in aid of construction, classified as investing activity. Includes, but is not limited to, contribution from developer, builder, government agency, and municipality.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: AllowanceForFundsUsedDuringConstructionInvestingActivities
children.description: Cash inflow due to change during the period in the allowance for other funds used during construction classified as an investing activity.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsToAcquireRoyaltyInterestsInMiningProperties
children.description: The cash outflow from the purchase of royalty interests in mining properties is the amount of cash the mineral producer pays the owner of the mine or mineral resource.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementInvestingActivities
children.description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of insurance claim, classified as investing activities. Excludes insurance settlement classified as operating activities.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredChargesInvesting
children.description: The increase (decrease) in noncurrent deferred charges, classified as investing activities.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsToAcquireManagementContractRights
children.description: The cash outflow from amounts paid for the rights to manage the property.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingActivities
children.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activity, classified as other.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: OriginationOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedParties
children.description: The cash outflow for a loan, supported by a promissory note, granted to related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedParties
children.description: The cash inflow from a loan, supported by a promissory note, granted to related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabilityInvestingActivities
children.description: Amount of cash outflow, made soon after acquisition date of business combination, to settle contingent consideration liability.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activity attributable to continuing operation. Investing activity includes, but is not limited to, making and collecting loan, acquiring and disposing of debt and equity instruments, property, plant, and equipment, and other productive assets.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: CashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations
children.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activity attributable to discontinued operation. Investing activity includes, but is not limited to, making and collecting loan, acquiring and disposing of debt and equity instruments, property, plant, and equipment, and other productive assets.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activity, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation. Investing activity includes, but is not limited to, making and collecting loan, acquiring and disposing of debt and equity instruments, property, plant, and equipment, and other productive assets.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivitiesContinuingOperations
IncreaseDecreaseInDeposits
IncreaseDecreaseInSavingsDeposits
children.description: The net cash inflow or outflow in the total of all savings account deposits, which may include passbook, statement savings accounts and money-market deposit accounts (MMDAs), classified as cash flows from financing activities.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInDemandDeposits
children.description: The net cash inflow or outflow in the total of all demand deposits, including checking and negotiable order of withdrawal (NOW) accounts, classified as cash flows from financing activities.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInTimeDeposits
IncreaseDecreaseInTimeDepositsOf100000OrMore
children.description: The increase (decrease) in time deposits equal to or greater than $100,000 per account.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInTimeDepositsOfLessThan100000
children.description: The increase (decrease) in time deposits less than $100,000 per account.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherTimeDeposits
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in time deposits classified as other.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: Net cash inflow (outflow) of time deposits.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInOtherDeposits
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deposit liabilities classified as other.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period deposits balances.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfDebt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfBankOverdrafts
children.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the excess drawing from an existing cash balance, which will be honored by the bank but reflected as a loan to the drawer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInBookOverdrafts
children.description: The increase (decrease) in cash during the period due to the net increase or decrease in book overdrafts.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: PaymentsForProceedsFromDepositOnLoan
children.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from resulting from payment, receipt or drawdown of cash deposit to guarantee a loan during the period.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInFederalFundsPurchasedAndSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseNet
IncreaseDecreaseInFederalFundsPurchased
children.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the fund borrowed from other financial institution arising from the insufficient reserve deposited at Federal Reserve Bank to meet legal requirement. This borrowing is usually contracted on an overnight basis at an agreed rate of interest.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromPaymentsForInSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchase
children.description: The cash flow from investments sold under the agreement to repurchase such investment.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the fund lent to other financial institution arising from the excess in reserve deposited at Federal Reserve Bank to meet legal requirement. This borrowing is usually contracted on an overnight basis at an agreed rate of interest. Also include cash inflow or outflow from investment sold under the agreement to reacquire such investment.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: IncreaseDecreaseInOutstandingChecksFinancingActivities
children.description: The change in cash during the period due to the net increase or decrease in outstanding checks, the liability that represents checks that have been issued but that have not cleared. The entity may classify these cash flows as financing or operating activities.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit
ProceedsFromSecuredLinesOfCredit
children.description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromUnsecuredLinesOfCredit
children.description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is uncollateralized (where debt is not backed by the pledge of collateral).
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The net cash inflow or cash outflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfCommercialPaper
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommercialPaper
children.description: The cash inflow from borrowing by issuing commercial paper.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfCommercialPaper
children.description: The cash outflow due to repaying amounts borrowed by issuing commercial paper.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The net cash inflow or cash outflow from issuing (borrowing) and repaying commercial paper.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromBankDebt
children.description: The cash inflow from bank borrowing during the year.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfBankDebt
children.description: The cash outflow to settle a bank borrowing during the year.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromSubordinatedShortTermDebt
children.description: The cash inflow from an obligation which places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior loan) in liquidation of the entity's assets scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle of the entity, if longer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfSubordinatedShortTermDebt
children.description: The cash outflow for an obligation which places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior loan) in liquidation of the entity's assets scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle of the entity, if longer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromNotesPayable
ProceedsFromSecuredNotesPayable
children.description: The cash inflow from borrowings supported by a written promise to pay an obligation that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromUnsecuredNotesPayable
children.description: The cash inflow from borrowings supported by a written promise to pay an obligation that is uncollateralized (where debt is not backed by the pledge of collateral).
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfNotesPayable
children.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromConstructionLoansPayable
children.description: The cash inflow from borrowings to finance the cost of construction.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfConstructionLoansPayable
children.description: The cash outflow from repayment of borrowings to finance the cost of construction.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt
children.description: Amount of cash inflow from short-term debt classified as other.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfOtherShortTermDebt
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLongTermDebtAndCapitalSecurities
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebtAndCapitalSecuritiesNet
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt
ProceedsFromLongTermLinesOfCredit
children.description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfMediumTermNotes
children.description: The cash inflow from a debt funding received on a regular basis with maturities ranging from 5-10 years.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSeniorLongTermDebt
children.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer).
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSubordinatedLongTermDebt
children.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing where a lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in liquidation of the entity's assets or underlying collateral.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowings
children.description: Amount of cash inflow from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) borrowing, classified as financing activity.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt
children.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt
children.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredTaxExemptDebt
children.description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term tax exempt debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt
children.description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt secured debt.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfUnsecuredTaxExemptDebt
children.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of long-term tax exempt debt that is not secured by collateral.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfUnsecuredDebt
children.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of long-term debt that is not secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt unsecured debt.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfFirstMortgageBond
children.description: The cash inflow from amounts received from a long-term debt instrument secured by a first mortgage deed of trust, containing a pledge of real property. The lender has the highest claim on the property in case of default.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromPollutionControlBond
children.description: The cash inflow from amounts received from a long-term debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfFinancialServicesObligations
children.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing issued by the entity involved in financial services operations.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt
children.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of long-term debt classified as other.

children.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromIssuanceOfMandatoryRedeemableCapitalSecurities
children.description: The cash inflow from issuance of an equity security that embodies an unconditional obligation requiring the issuer to redeem the security by transferring the assets at a specified or determinable date (or dates) that is (or are) initially more than one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer) from the issuance date, or upon an event that is certain to occur beyond one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer) from the issuance date.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: Amount of cash inflow from long-term debt, finance lease obligation, and mandatorily redeemable capital security.

children.name: RepaymentsOfLongTermDebtAndCapitalSecurities
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt
RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit
children.description: The cash outflow for the settlement of obligation drawn from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfMediumTermNotes
children.description: The cash outflow to pay off borrowing used to receive debt funding on a regular basis with maturities ranging from 5-10 years.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfSeniorDebt
MaturitiesOfSeniorDebt
children.description: The cash outflow for the settlement of long-term borrowing, with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation, as it matures.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: EarlyRepaymentOfSeniorDebt
children.description: The cash outflow for the extinguishment of long-term borrowing, with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation, before its maturity.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The cash outflow for a long-term debt where the holder has highest claim on the entity's asset in case of bankruptcy or liquidation during the period.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfSubordinatedDebt
MaturitiesOfSubordinatedDebt
children.description: The cash outflow for a long-term borrowing where lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in case of liquidation of the entity's assets as it matures.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: EarlyRepaymentOfSubordinatedDebt
children.description: The cash outflow from the repayment of long-term borrowing where a lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in case of liquidation of the entity's assets before its maturity.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The cash outflow from the repayment of long-term borrowing where a lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in case of liquidation of the entity's assets or underlying collateral.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowings
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for repayment of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) borrowing, classified as financing activity.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfConvertibleDebt
children.description: The cash outflow from the repayment of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt
children.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfAssumedDebt
children.description: The cash outflow from the repayments of a long-term debt originally issued by another party but is assumed by the entity.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfUnsecuredTaxExemptDebt
children.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term tax exempt debt that is not secured by collateral.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt
children.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt secured debt.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfUnsecuredDebt
children.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is not secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt unsecured debt.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfFirstMortgageBond
children.description: The cash outflow from the repayment of a long-term debt instrument issued, secured by a first mortgage deed of trust, containing a pledge of real property. The lender has the highest claim on the property in case of default.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfPollutionControlBond
children.description: The cash outflow from settlement of a long-term debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

children.name: FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments
children.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: RepaymentsOfMandatoryRedeemableCapitalSecurities
children.description: The cash outflow related to equity securities that embody an unconditional obligation requiring the issuer to redeem the securities by transferring the assets at a specified or determinable date (or dates) that is (or are) initially more than one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer) from the issuance date, or upon an event that is certain to occur beyond one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer) from the issuance date.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: Amount of cash outflow for debt, mandatory redeemable security, and principal payment for finance lease obligation.

children.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt, finance lease obligation, and mandatorily redeemable capital security.

AdditionsToContractHoldersFunds

children.description: The cash outflow for a segregated fund account during the period.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: The cash inflow or outflow for a segregated fund account during the period.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: NetChangeAnnuitiesAndInvestmentCertificates
ProceedsFromAnnuitiesAndInvestmentCertificates
children.description: The cash inflow from an insurance contract under which the policy holder make a lump sum payment or a series of payments in exchange for periodic payments to the policyholder beginning immediately or at some future date.

children.description: The cash outflow for an insurance contract under which the policy holder make a lump sum payment or a series of payments in exchange for periodic payments to the policyholder beginning immediately or at some future date.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

ProceedsFromOtherDebt

children.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) for debt classified as other.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: ProceedsFromPaymentsForDepositsAppliedToDebtRetirements
ProceedsFromDepositsAppliedToDebtRetirements

children.description: Cash outflow during the period as a deposit on account for application (deposits to retire or pay down) against an amount of debt owed by the entity.

children.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from payments to deposit account and application of deposits to retire or pay down debt during the period.

children.name: RepaymentsOfLongtermLoansFromVendors
children.description: Cash outflows under financing arrangements with vendors (seller-financed debt), which had a maturity date at inception of more than one year (or more than one operating cycle, if longer); such debt may have arisen from purchases of property, plant and equipment or other productive assets.

children.description: The net cash inflow or outflow in aggregate debt due to repayments and proceeds from additional borrowings.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts

PaymentsForDerivativeInstrumentFinancingActivities

The trust's assets are deeply subordinated debentures of the bank holding entity. Most trust preferred securities are subject to a mandatory redemption upon the repayment of the debentures.

The trust's assets are deeply subordinated debentures of the bank holding entity. Most trust preferred securities are subject to a mandatory redemption upon the repayment of the debentures.

The trust's assets are deeply subordinated debentures of the bank holding entity. Most trust preferred securities are subject to a mandatory redemption upon the repayment of the debentures.

children.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activity attributable to continuing operation. Financing activity includes, but is not limited to, obtaining resource from owner and providing return on, and return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amount borrowed, or settling obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resource obtained from creditor on long-term credit.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: CashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations
children.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activity attributable to discontinued operation. Financing activity includes, but is not limited to, obtaining resource from owner and providing return on, and return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amount borrowed, or settling obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resource obtained from creditor on long-term credit.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activity, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation. Financing activity includes, but is not limited to, obtaining resource from owner and providing return on, and return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amount borrowed, or settling obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resource obtained from creditor on long-term credit.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: Amount, excluding effect from change in exchange rate, of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalent, and cash and cash equivalent restricted to withdrawal or usage; including, but not limited to, discontinued operation. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.name: EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalentsDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperations

Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.
children.disclosure: 152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows

children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate change on cash and cash equivalent, and cash and cash equivalent restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currency; including, but not limited to, discontinued operation. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.

152200 - Statement - Statement of Cash F.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalent, and cash and cash equivalent restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change and including, but not limited to, discontinued operation. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.
