For example, but not limited to, acquisition-date income tax benefits or expenses recognized from changes in the acquirer's valuation allowance for its previously existing deferred tax assets resulting from a business combination and adjustments to beginning-of-year balance of a valuation allowance because of a change in circumstance causing a change in judgment about the realizability of the related deferred tax asset in future periods.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount of other current and other deferred income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operations.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholdersDiluted

children.name: NetIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersDiluted
children.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) from continuing operations available to common shareholders.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NetIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersDiluted
children.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) from discontinued operations available to common shareholders.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholdersBasic

children.name: NetIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersBasic
children.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) from continuing operations available to common shareholders.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NetIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersBasic
children.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) from discontinued operations available to common shareholders.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: EarningsPerShareBasic

children.name: EarningsPerShareBasicDistributed
children.description: Dividends declared in the period and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid per security.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: EarningsPerShareBasicUndistributed
children.description: The earnings attributable to each security on the basis that all of the earnings for the period had been distributed (to the extent that each security may share in earnings). This is the earnings amount which reflects the participation rights in undistributed earnings of each security.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: EarningsPerShareDiluted

children.name: EarningsPerShareDilutedDistributed
children.description: Dividends declared in the period and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid per security, taking into account all dilutive potential common shares outstanding during the period.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: EarningsPerShareDilutedUndistributed
children.description: The earnings attributable to each security on the basis that all of the earnings for the period had been distributed (to the extent that each security may share in earnings). This is the earnings amount which reflects the participation rights in undistributed earnings of each security, after giving effect to all dilutive potential common shares outstanding during the period.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTaxAttributableToReportingEntity

children.name: IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTax
DiscontinuedOperationAmountOfAdjustmentToPriorPeriodGainLossOnDisposalNetOfTax
DiscontinuedOperationAmountOfAdjustmentToPriorPeriodGainLossOnDisposalBeforeIncomeTax
children.description: Amount before tax of an increase (decrease) to a gain (loss) previously reported in discontinued operations in a prior period.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DiscontinuedOperationTaxEffectOfAdjustmentToPriorPeriodGainLossOnDisposal
children.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for an increase (decrease) to a gain (loss) previously reported in discontinued operations in a prior period.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount after tax of an increase (decrease) to a gain (loss) previously reported in discontinued operations in a prior period.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalOfDiscontinuedOperationNetOfTax
DiscontinuedOperationGainLossFromDisposalOfDiscontinuedOperationBeforeIncomeTax
children.description: Amount before tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DiscontinuedOperationTaxEffectOfIncomeLossFromDisposalOfDiscontinuedOperation
children.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) on gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount after tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationDuringPhaseOutPeriodNetOfTax
DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationDuringPhaseOutPeriodBeforeIncomeTax
children.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation. Excludes gain (loss) on disposal and provision for gain (loss) until its disposal.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DiscontinuedOperationTaxEffectOfIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationDuringPhaseOutPeriod
children.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation. Excludes tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) on disposal and for provision for gain (loss) until disposal.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation. Excludes gain (loss) on disposal and provision for gain (loss) until disposal.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DiscontinuedOperationProvisionForLossGainOnDisposalNetOfTax
DiscontinuedOperationProvisionForLossGainOnDisposalBeforeIncomeTax
children.description: Amount before tax of (gain) loss recognized for the (reversal of write-down) write-down to fair value, less cost to sell, of a discontinued operation.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DiscontinuedOperationTaxExpenseBenefitFromProvisionForGainLossOnDisposal
children.description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit on (gain) loss recognized for the (reversal of write-down) write-down to fair value, less cost to sell, of a discontinued operation.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount after tax of (gain) loss recognized for the (reversal of write-down) write-down to fair value, less cost to sell, of a discontinued operation.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
children.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the parent. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations

children.name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
children.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations including portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAttributableToNoncontrollingEntity
children.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the noncontrolling interest.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: IncomeLossAttributableToParent

children.name: IncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeIncomeTaxesExtraordinaryItemsNoncontrollingInterest
children.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationBeforeIncomeTax
children.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: IncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
children.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to parent. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: CostsAndExpenses

children.name: CostOfRevenue
children.description: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: OperatingExpenses
children.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Total costs of sales and operating expenses for the period.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: InterestAndDividendIncomeSecurities

children.name: DividendIncomeEquitySecuritiesOperating
children.description: Amount of dividend income on investment in equity security, classified as operating.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestIncomeDebtSecuritiesOperating
InterestIncomeDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleOperating
children.description: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale); classified as operating.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestAndDividendIncomeSecuritiesHeldToMaturity
children.description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on held-to-maturity securities.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestIncomeDebtSecuritiesTradingOperating
children.description: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount, on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading); classified as operating.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount, on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading); classified as operating.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestAndDividendIncomeSecuritiesOther
children.description: Amount of other operating dividend and interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount of operating dividend and interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: RevenuesNetOfInterestExpense

children.name: Revenues
children.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseOperating
InterestExpenseDeposits
InterestExpenseDomesticDeposits
InterestExpenseNOWAccountsMoneyMarketAccountsAndSavingsDeposits
InterestExpenseNegotiableOrderOfWithdrawalNOWDeposits
children.description: Interest expense incurred on the amount of Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW). Interest-bearing transaction account that combines the payable on demand feature of checks and investment feature of savings accounts. A NOW account is functionally an interest paying checking account.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseMoneyMarketDeposits
children.description: Interest expense incurred on all money market deposits.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseSavingsDeposits
children.description: Interest expense incurred on all savings account deposits.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on the following for deposits in domestic offices: (1) transaction accounts (NOW, and telephone and preauthorized transfer accounts), (2) money market deposits and (3) savings deposits.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseDemandDepositAccounts
children.description: Interest expense incurred on demand deposit accounts that represent borrowings rather than outstanding drafts.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseTimeDeposits
InterestExpenseTimeDepositsLessThan100000
children.description: Interest expense incurred on time deposits, including certificates of deposits, less than $100,000 in domestic offices.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseTimeDeposits100000OrMore
children.description: Interest expense incurred on time deposits, including certificates of deposits, of $100,000 or more in domestic offices.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on time deposits, including certificates of deposits, in domestic offices.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseOtherDomesticDeposits
children.description: Interest expense incurred on other deposits in domestic offices.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on all domestic deposits.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseForeignDeposits
children.description: Interest expense on all foreign deposits.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all deposits.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseTradingLiabilities
children.description: Interest expense incurred on short positions arising from sales of securities and other assets, which the entity does not own, to other parties. Trading liabilities includes the fair value of derivative contracts held for trading that are in loss positions.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseBorrowings
InterestExpenseShortTermBorrowings
InterestExpenseFederalFundsPurchasedAndSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchase
InterestExpenseFederalFundsPurchased
children.description: Gross expenses on the purchase of Federal funds at a specified price with a simultaneous agreement to sell the same to the same counterparty at a fixed or determinable price at a future date.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchase
children.description: Gross expenses on securities sold coupled with an agreement to repurchase the same from the same counterparty at a fixed or determinable price within a fixed or variable time period.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: The aggregate expense incurred on federal funds purchased and securities sold under agreements to repurchase. If amounts recognized as payables under repurchase agreements have been offset against amounts recognized as receivables under reverse repurchase agreements and reported as a net amount on the balance sheet, the income and expense from these agreements may be reported on a net basis.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseShortTermBorrowingsExcludingFederalFundsAndSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchase
InterestExpenseFederalHomeLoanBankAndFederalReserveBankAdvancesShortTerm
children.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on short-term borrowings associated with Federal Home Loan Bank and Federal Reserve Bank advances.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseCommercialPaper
children.description: Amount of interest expense on commercial paper.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseOtherShortTermBorrowings
children.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on other short-term borrowings.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on short-term borrowings including commercial paper, Federal Home Loan Bank and Federal Reserve Bank advances and other short term borrowings.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on short-term borrowings including commercial paper and Federal funds purchased and securities sold under agreements to repurchase.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseLongTermDebtAndCapitalSecurities
InterestExpenseLongTermDebt
InterestExpenseSubordinatedNotesAndDebentures
children.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on subordinated notes and debentures. Includes amortization of expenses incurred in the issuance of subordinated notes and debentures.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseJuniorSubordinatedDebentures
children.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on junior subordinated debentures. Includes amortization of expenses incurred in the issuance of subordinated notes and debentures.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseMediumTermNotes
children.description: Amount of interest expense incurred on medium-term note.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseFederalHomeLoanBankAndFederalReserveBankAdvancesLongTerm
children.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on long-term borrowings associated with Federal Home Loan Bank and Federal Reserve Bank advances.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseOtherLongTermDebt
children.description: Amount of interest expense incurred on long-term debt classified as other, including, but not limited to, interest on long-term notes and amortization of issuance costs.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Aggregate amount of interest paid or due on all long-term debt.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseCapitalSecurities
children.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on capital securities issued by the reporting entity.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Total interest expense on long-term debt and capital securities.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all borrowings.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseBeneficialInterestsIssuedByConsolidatedVariableInterestEntities
children.description: Interest expense on beneficial interests issued by consolidated variable interest entities.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseTrustPreferredSecurities
children.description: The amount of interest incurred to a trust which has issued trust-preferred securities. In order to issue trust preferred securities, a sponsor forms a trust by investing a nominal amount of cash to purchase all of the voting common stock of the trust. The trust issues nonvoting, mandatorily redeemable preferred securities to outside investors in exchange for cash. The proceeds received from the issuance of the preferred securities, together with the cash received for issuing the common stock to the sponsor, is then loaned to the sponsor in exchange for a note which has the same terms as the trust preferred securities. Trust preferred securities possesses characteristics of both equity and debt issues and are generally issued by bank holding companies.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount of interest expense classified as operating.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income after deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: IncomeLossFromIndividuallySignificantComponentDisposedOfOrHeldForSaleExcludingDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToParentBeforeIncomeTax

children.name: IncomeLossFromIndividuallySignificantComponentDisposedOfOrHeldForSaleExcludingDiscontinuedOperationsBeforeIncomeTax
children.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from an individually significant component disposed of or held-for-sale including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Excludes discontinued operations.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: IncomeLossFromIndividuallySignificantComponentDisposedOfOrHeldForSaleExcludingDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestBeforeIncomeTax
children.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from an individually significant component disposed of or held-for-sale attributable to noncontrolling interest. Excludes discontinued operations.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from an individually significant component disposed of or held-for-sale attributable to parent. Excludes discontinued operations.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationDuringPhaseOutPeriodBeforeIncomeTaxAttributableToParent

children.name: DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationDuringPhaseOutPeriodBeforeIncomeTax
children.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation. Excludes gain (loss) on disposal and provision for gain (loss) until its disposal.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationDuringPhaseOutPeriodBeforeIncomeTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
children.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Excludes gain (loss) on disposal and provision for gain (loss) until its disposal.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation attributable to the parent. Excludes gain (loss) on disposal and provision for gain (loss) until its disposal.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipAndGeneralPartnershipUnitBasicAndDiluted

children.name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipAndGeneralPartnershipUnitBasicAndDiluted
children.description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each basic and diluted limited partnership and general partnership unit when the per unit amount is the same for both basic and diluted units.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTaxPerOutstandingLimitedPartnershipAndGeneralPartnershipUnitBasicAndDiluted
children.description: The amount of income (loss) derived from discontinued operations during the period, net of related tax effect, per each basic and diluted limited partnership and general partnership unit when the per unit amount is the same for both basic and diluted units.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: The amount of net income or loss for the period per each limited partnership and general partnership unit in instances when basic and diluted earnings per unit are the same amount and aggregated on the face of the financial statements. Basic earnings per unit is the amount of net income or loss for the period per unit outstanding during the reporting period. Diluted earnings per unit includes the amount of net income or loss for the period available to each limited and general partnership unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of units for all dilutive potential units outstanding during the reporting period.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: GainLossOnSaleOfTrustAssetsToPayExpenses

children.name: SaleOfTrustAssetsToPayExpenses
children.description: Amount of sale of trust assets (includes, but is not limited to, gold and silver) to pay trust expenses.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: CostOfTrustAssetsSoldToPayExpenses
children.description: Cost of trust assets sold to pay trust expenses (includes commodities, but is not limited to, gold and silver).
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Gain (loss) related to the sale of trust assets (includes, but is not limited to, gold and silver) to pay trust expenses.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: IncomeLossFromSubsidiariesNetOfTax

children.name: IncomeLossFromSubsidiariesBeforeTax
children.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) of subsidiary attributable to the parent entity.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: IncomeLossFromSubsidiariesTaxExpenseBenefit
children.description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) on income (loss) of subsidiary attributable to the parent entity.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) of subsidiary attributable to the parent entity.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: UndistributedEarningsLossAvailableToCommonShareholdersDiluted

children.name: UndistributedEarningsLossFromContinuingOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersDiluted
children.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations, allocated to common stock, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: UndistributedEarningsLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersDiluted
children.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations, allocated to common stock, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss), allocated to common stock, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: UndistributedEarningsDiluted

children.name: UndistributedContinuingOperationEarningsLossDiluted
children.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations, allocated to common stock and participating securities, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: UndistributedDiscontinuedOperationEarningsLossDiluted
children.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations, allocated to common stock and participating securities, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed. Includes the adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: UndistributedEarningsLossAvailableToCommonShareholdersBasic

children.name: UndistributedEarnings
NetIncomeLoss
children.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DistributedEarnings
Dividends
DividendsCash
DividendsCommonStockCash
children.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DividendsPreferredStockCash
children.description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DividendsShareBasedCompensationCash
children.description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash dividends declared for award under share-based payment arrangement.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: The total amount of dividends declared in the period for each class of stock and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid for the period (for example, unpaid cumulative dividends). Dividends declared in the current period do not include dividends declared in respect of prior-period unpaid cumulative dividends. Preferred dividends that are cumulative only if earned are deducted only to the extent that they are earned.

children.description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed.

124001 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: LeaseCost

children.name: OperatingLeaseCost
children.description: Amount of single lease cost, calculated by allocation of remaining cost of lease over remaining lease term. Includes, but is not limited to, single lease cost, after impairment of right-of-use asset, calculated by amortization of remaining right-of-use asset and accretion of lease liability.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount of short-term lease cost, excluding expense for lease with term of one month or less.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: VariableLeaseCost
children.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.
children.disclosure: 124001 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards forfeited during the period.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards issued during the period, net of the stock value of such awards forfeited.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions
children.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptionsExercised
children.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOfUnits
children.description: Value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividend
children.description: Value of stock issued to shareholders as a dividend during the period.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueDividendReinvestmentPlan
children.description: Value of stock issued during the period from a dividend reinvestment plan (DRIP). A dividend reinvestment plan allows the holder of the stock to reinvest dividends paid to them by the entity on new issues of stock by the entity.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValuePurchaseOfAssets
children.description: Value of shares of stock issued during the period as part of a transaction to acquire assets that do not qualify as a business combination.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther
children.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodValue
children.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue
children.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: TreasuryStockValueAcquiredParValueMethod
children.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the par value method.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod
children.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: TreasuryStockReissuedAtLowerThanRepurchasePrice
children.description: In cases when treasury stock is reissued at a price lower than the cost to repurchase, the excess difference between the selling price and cost to repurchase is charged against retained earnings (assuming that all APIC arising from treasury stock transactions has first been exhausted).
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: TreasuryStockRetiredParValueMethodAmount
children.description: Amount of decrease of par value, additional paid in capital (APIC) and retained earnings of common and preferred stock retired from treasury when treasury stock is accounted for under the par value method.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: TreasuryStockRetiredCostMethodAmount
children.description: Amount of decrease of par value, additional paid in capital (APIC) and retained earnings of common and preferred stock retired from treasury when treasury stock is accounted for under the cost method.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueTreasuryStockReissued
children.description: Value of treasury shares or units reissued. Excludes reissuance of shares or units in treasury for award under share-based payment arrangement.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockRedeemedOrCalledDuringPeriodValue
children.description: Equity impact of the value of stock bought back by the entity at the exercise price or redemption price.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockholdersEquityOther
children.description: This element represents movements included in the statement of changes in stockholders' equity which are not separately disclosed or provided for elsewhere in the taxonomy.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: AcceleratedShareRepurchaseProgramAdjustment
children.description: The amount needed to adjust previously recorded stockholders' equity balances to the actual aggregate amounts paid, whether in cash or other consideration, to acquire all of the shares purchased under an Accelerated Share Repurchase arrangement.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOfConvertibleSecuritiesNetOfAdjustments
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOfConvertibleSecurities
children.description: The gross value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalEquityComponentOfConvertibleDebt
children.description: Adjustment to additional paid in capital resulting from the recognition of convertible debt instruments as two separate components - a debt component and an equity component. This bifurcation may result in a basis difference associated with the liability component that represents a temporary difference for purposes of applying accounting for income taxes. The initial recognition of deferred taxes for the tax effect of that temporary difference is as an adjustment to additional paid in capital.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalEquityComponentOfConvertibleDebtSubsequentAdjustments
children.description: The amount of subsequent adjustments to additional paid in capital for convertible financial instruments where a component of equity and a component of debt are recognized.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.description: The net amount of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities, net of adjustments (for example, to additional paid in capital) including the write-off of an equity component recognized to record the convertible debt instrument as two separate components - a debt component and an equity component. This item is meant to disclose the value of shares issued on conversion of convertible securities that were recorded as two separate (debt and equity) components.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockholdersEquityNoteSpinoffTransaction
children.description: The change in equity as a result of a spin-off transaction (a regular or reverse spin-off) which is based on the recorded amounts.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: NetIncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributableToNonredeemableNoncontrollingInterest
children.description: Amount after income tax of income (loss) including the portion attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest. Excludes the portion attributable to redeemable noncontrolling interest recognized as temporary equity.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax
children.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: WarrantDownRoundFeatureIncreaseDecreaseInEquityAmount1
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in equity for down round feature triggered for warrant classified as equity.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: StockOptionDownRoundFeatureIncreaseDecreaseInEquityAmount1
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in equity for down round feature triggered for stock option classified as equity. Excludes share-based payment arrangement.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: PreferredStockConvertibleDownRoundFeatureIncreaseDecreaseInEquityAmount1
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in equity for down round feature triggered for convertible preferred stock.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: EquityClassifiedWrittenCallOptionModificationEquityIssuanceIncreaseDecreaseInEquityAmount
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in equity for freestanding written call option classified as equity from modification recognized as equity issuance cost. Includes, but is not limited to, exchange by issuer and holder. Excludes share-based payment arrangement.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: EquityClassifiedWrittenCallOptionModificationDebtOriginationIncreaseInEquityAmount
children.description: Amount of increase in equity for freestanding written call option classified as equity from modification recognized as debt discount or debt issuance cost related to debt origination. Includes, but is not limited to, exchange by issuer and holder. Excludes share-based payment arrangement.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: EquityClassifiedWrittenCallOptionModificationDebtModificationIncreaseDecreaseInEquityAmount
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in equity for freestanding written call option classified as equity from modification recognized as debt extinguishment or troubled debt restructuring related to debt modification. Includes, but is not limited to, exchange by issuer and holder. Excludes share-based payment arrangement.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: EquityClassifiedWrittenCallOptionModificationDividendIncreaseDecreaseInEquityAmount
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in equity for freestanding written call option classified as equity from modification recognized as dividend. Includes, but is not limited to, exchange by issuer and holder. Excludes share-based payment arrangement.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: AociCashFlowHedgeReferenceRateReformIncreaseDecreaseBeforeTax
children.description: Amount, before tax, of increase (decrease) to accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for receipt (payment) of compensation for modification of interest rate related to reference rate reform for cash flow hedge.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: AociCashFlowHedgeReferenceRateReformIncreaseDecreaseAfterTax
children.description: Amount, after tax, of increase (decrease) to accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for receipt (payment) of compensation for modification of interest rate related to reference rate reform for cash flow hedge.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: LeaseholdImprovementUnderlyingAssetUnderCommonControlIncreaseDecreaseInEquity
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in equity for leasehold improvement on lease under common control when lessee no longer controls underlying asset.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityEliminationOfAccretionDeconsolidationOfSubsidiary
children.description: Amount of increase to equity from elimination of previously recorded charge to equity for adjustment to carrying amount of noncontrolling interest from deconsolidation of subsidiary.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareh.description: The increase (decrease) in stockholders' equity during the period.

148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareh.name: TemporaryEquityIssuePeriodIncreaseOrDecrease

children.name: ReclassificationsOfTemporaryToPermanentEquity
children.description: The difference between the carrying amount of a financial instrument subject to a registration payment arrangement recorded as temporary equity prior to adoption of FSP EITF 00-19-2 and the carrying amount reclassified to permanent equity upon the adoption of FSP EITF 00-19-2. Recorded as a cumulative effect adjustment to the beginning balance of retained earnings. Does not apply to registration payment arrangements that are no longer outstanding upon adoption of FSP EITF 00-19-2.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: TemporaryEquityStockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues
children.description: Value of new stock classified as temporary equity issued during the period.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: TemporaryEquityAccretionOfDividends
children.description: Value of accretion of temporary equity during the period due to unpaid dividends.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValue
children.description: Value of accretion of temporary equity to its redemption value during the period.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: TemporaryEquityNetIncome
children.description: The portion of net income or loss attributable to temporary equity interest.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: TemporaryEquityForeignCurrencyTranslationAdjustments
children.description: Adjustments to temporary equity resulting from foreign currency translation adjustments.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: TemporaryEquityInterestInSubsidiaryEarnings
children.description: Subsidiary earnings portion attributable to temporary equity.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: TemporaryEquityEliminationAsPartofReorganization
children.description: Redemption of temporary equity as the result of a triggering event associated with the temporary equity.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

children.name: TemporaryEquityOtherChanges
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in temporary equity from changes classified as other.
children.disclosure: 148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareholders' Equity

148600 - Statement - Statement of Shareh.description: Change in the value of each type or class of stock classified as temporary equity during the period. The redemption requirement does not constitute an unconditional obligation that will be settled in a variable number of shares constituting a monetary value predominantly indexed to (a) a fixed monetary amount known at inception, (b) an amount inversely correlated with the residual value of the entity, or (c) an amount determined by reference to something other than the fair value of issuer's stock. Does not include mandatorily redeemable stock. The exception is if redemption is required upon liquidation or termination of the reporting entity.

320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans.name: AccountsReceivableBilledForLongTermContractsOrPrograms

children.name: ContractReceivableDueOneYearOrLess
children.description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans, Notes Receivable, and Others

children.name: ContractReceivableDueAfterOneYear
children.description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected after next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans, Notes Receivable, and Others

320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans.description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs but not paid. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract.
320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans.disclosure: 320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans, Notes Receivable, and Others

320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans.name: NotesReceivableGross

children.name: NotesAndLoansReceivableGrossCurrent
children.description: Amortized cost, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as current. Excludes net investment in lease.
children.disclosure: 320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans, Notes Receivable, and Others

children.name: NotesAndLoansReceivableGrossNoncurrent
children.description: Amortized cost, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as noncurrent. Excludes net investment in lease.

320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans.description: Amortized cost, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement and net investment in lease.
320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans.disclosure: 320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans, Notes Receivable, and Others

320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans.name: ContractsReceivableClaimsAndUncertainAmounts

children.name: ContractsReceivableClaimsAndUncertainAmountsExpectedToBeCollectedWithinOneYear
children.description: Amount of billed or unbilled claims or similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization under long-term contracts that are expected to be collected in the next fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans, Notes Receivable, and Others

children.name: ContractsReceivableClaimsAndUncertainAmountsExpectedToBeCollectedAfterOneYear
children.description: Amount of billed or unbilled claims or similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization under long-term contracts that are expected to be collected after the next fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans, Notes Receivable, and Others

320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans.description: Amount of billed or unbilled claims or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization under long-term contracts.
320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans.disclosure: 320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans, Notes Receivable, and Others

children.name: ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses
children.description: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.

children.name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossesRecovery
children.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

children.name: FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLossesWriteOffs
children.description: Amount of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable.

children.name: TradeReceivablesHeldForSaleReconciliationToCashFlowAdditionsToHeldForSale
children.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of addition to trade receivable held for sale that is not part of disposal group.

children.name: TradeReceivablesHeldForSaleReconciliationToCashFlowDeductionsFromHeldForSale
children.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of deduction to trade receivable held for sale that is not part of disposal group.

children.description: Amount, before valuation allowance, of financing receivable classified as held-for-sale.

320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans.description: Amount, before valuation allowance, of accounts and financing receivables held for sale.

320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans.name: ReceivableWithImputedInterestNetAmount

children.name: ReceivableWithImputedInterestFaceAmount
children.description: The principal amount of the receivable or note before consideration of the discount or premium.
children.disclosure: 320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans, Notes Receivable, and Others

children.name: ReceivableWithImputedInterestPremium
children.description: Disclosure of the unamortized amount of the premium on the note or receivable which is added to the face amount of the receivable or loan. The discount or premium is defined as the difference between the present value and the face amount.
children.disclosure: 320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans, Notes Receivable, and Others

children.name: ReceivableWithImputedInterestDiscount
children.description: Disclosure of the unamortized amount of the discount on the note or receivable which is deducted from the face amount of the receivable or loan. The discount or premium is the difference between the present value and the face amount.
children.disclosure: 320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans, Notes Receivable, and Others

320000 - Disclosure - Receivables, Loans.description: The receivable or note face amount less the unamortized discount or premium.

TimeSharingTransactionsMaturitiesOfNotesReceivableYearOne
children.description: Amount, before allowance for uncollectible account, of notes receivable for time-sharing transaction maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. children.description: Amount of notes receivable related to time share sales, before allowance for uncollectible accounts and deferred profit.
