children.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

children.name: PriceRiskDerivativeLiabilitiesAtFairValue
children.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of price risk derivative liabilities, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized as liabilities on the balance sheet.
children.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of price risk derivative assets, net of price risk derivative liabilities, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized on the balance sheet.
805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.name: PriceRiskFairValueHedgeDerivativeAtFairValueNet

children.name: PriceRiskFairValueHedgeAssetAtFairValue
children.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivative assets designated as fair value hedging instruments.
children.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

children.name: PriceRiskFairValueHedgeLiabilityAtFairValue
children.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivative liabilities designated as fair value hedging instruments.
children.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivatives designated as fair value hedging instruments.
805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.name: UnrealizedGainLossOnForeignCurrencyDerivativesNetBeforeTax

children.name: UnrealizedGainOnForeignCurrencyDerivativesBeforeTax
children.description: Amount of unrealized gain related to the increase in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments. Recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.
children.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

children.name: UnrealizedLossOnForeignCurrencyDerivativesBeforeTax
children.description: Amount of unrealized loss recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income pertaining to the decrease in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments to the extent that a cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.
children.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.description: Amount of net unrealized gain (loss) related to the change in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments. Recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.
805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.name: UnrealizedGainLossOnPriceRiskCashFlowDerivativesBeforeTax

children.name: UnrealizedGainOnPriceRiskCashFlowDerivativesBeforeTax
children.description: Amount of unrealized gain from the increase in fair value of price risk derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income in the period, before taxes, to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.
children.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

children.name: UnrealizedLossOnPriceRiskCashFlowDerivativesBeforeTax
children.description: Amount of unrealized loss related to the decrease in fair value of price risk derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income in the period, before taxes, to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.
children.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) arising from the change in fair value of price risk derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income in the period, before taxes, to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.
805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.name: DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeNet

children.name: DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAssetAmountNotOffsetAgainstCollateral
children.description: Fair value, after offset of derivative liability, of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, before offset against an obligation to return collateral under a master netting arrangement. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.
children.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

children.name: DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiabilityAmountNotOffsetAgainstCollateral
children.description: Fair value, after offset of derivative asset, of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, elected not to be and before offset against a right to receive collateral under a master netting arrangement. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.
children.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.description: Fair value of the assets less the liabilities of a derivative or group of derivatives.
805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.name: ClosedPortfolioAndBeneficialInterestLastOfLayerAmortizedCost

children.name: PrepayableFinancialAssetClosedPortfolioLastOfLayerAmortizedCost
children.description: Amortized cost of closed portfolio of financial asset used to designate hedging relationship in which hedged item is expected to be outstanding for designated hedged period.
children.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

children.name: BeneficialInterestSecuredByPrepayableFinancialInstrumentsLastOfLayerAmortizedCost
children.description: Amortized cost of beneficial interest secured by financial instrument, used to designate hedging relationship in which hedged item is expected to be outstanding for designated hedge period.
children.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.description: Amortized cost of closed portfolio of financial asset and beneficial interest secured by financial instrument, used to designate hedging relationship in which hedged item is expected to be outstanding for designated hedge period.
805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.name: DerivativeExcludedComponentGainLossRecognizedInEarnings

children.name: DerivativeExcludedComponentGainRecognizedInEarnings
children.description: Amount of gain from excluded component of derivative hedge, recognized in earnings. Excludes recognition under systematic and rational method.
children.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

children.name: DerivativeExcludedComponentLossRecognizedInEarnings
children.description: Amount of loss from excluded component of derivative hedge, recognized in earnings. Excludes recognition under systematic and rational method.
children.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.description: Amount of gain (loss) from excluded component of derivative hedge, recognized in earnings. Excludes recognition under systematic and rational method.
805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instrum.disclosure: 805000 - Disclosure - Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities

152000 - Statement - Statement of Partne.name: PartnersCapitalAccountPeriodIncreaseDecrease

children.name: ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
children.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountContributions
children.description: Total contributions made by each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountDistributionAmount
children.description: The total amount of distributions to the general partner during the period.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountDistributionAmount
children.description: The total amount of distributions to limited partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: IncentiveDistributionDistributionPerYear
children.description: Amount of incentive obligation paid in cash or stock during the period to a limited liability corporation managing member or limited partnership general partner.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.description: Total distributions to each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountAcquisitions
children.description: Change in the different classes of partners' capital accounts during the year due to acquisitions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountOptionExercise
children.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to option exercise. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountReturnOfCapital
children.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to the return of partner's capital. That is, excess distributions over earnings to partners. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountDeferredCompensation
children.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to deferred compensation. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitBasedCompensation
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital account for unit-based payment arrangement issued by partnership. Partner includes, but is not limited to, general, limited and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions
children.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountSaleOfUnits
PartnersCapitalAccountPrivatePlacementOfUnits
children.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a private placement.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnits
children.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a public offering.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to the sale of units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountExchangesAndConversions
children.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to exchanges and conversions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountTreasuryUnitsPurchases
children.description: Value of units that were previously issued and have been repurchased during the year.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountTreasuryUnitsReissued
children.description: Value of units that were previously issued and then were repurchased and classified as treasury units. This element represents the monetary value of these units which were reissued during the period.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalOther
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital classified as other.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

152000 - Statement - Statement of Partne.description: Changes in the ownership interest during the period of each class of partners. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

152000 - Statement - Statement of Partne.name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsPeriodIncreaseDecrease

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsAcquisitions
children.description: Change in the number of units for each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to acquisitions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsContributed
children.description: Units contributed by each class of partners during the year. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsConverted
children.description: The number of units converted into shares of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSaleOfUnits
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPublicOffering
children.description: The number of units sold in a public offering of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPrivatePlacement
children.description: The number of units sold in a private placement of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.description: Total units issued during the year due to the sale of units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsRedeemed
children.description: The number of units redeemed during the year of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsTreasury
children.description: Units that were previously issued and have been repurchased during the year.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsTreasuryUnitsReissued
children.description: Units that were previously issued and then were repurchased and classified as treasury units. This element represents the number of these units which were reissued during the period.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

children.name: PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsUnitbasedCompensation
children.description: Number of units issued for unit-based payment arrangement issued by partnership. Partner includes, but is not limited to, general, limited and preferred partners.
children.disclosure: 152000 - Statement - Statement of Partners' Capital

152000 - Statement - Statement of Partne.description: Total net change in the units of each class of partners' capital accounts during the year. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services.name: NotesReceivableGross

children.name: FinancingReceivableBeforeAllowanceForCreditLossMaturityRollingWithinOneYear
children.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, maturing in next rolling fiscal year following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: FinancingReceivableBeforeAllowanceForCreditLossMaturityRollingAfterYearOneThroughFiveYears
children.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, maturing in second through fifth rolling fiscal year following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: FinancingReceivableBeforeAllowanceForCreditLossMaturityRollingAfterYearFiveThoughFifteenYears
children.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, maturing in sixth through fifteenth rolling fiscal year following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: FinancingReceivableBeforeAllowanceForCreditLossMaturityRollingAfterYear15
children.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, maturing after fifteenth rolling fiscal year following current statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services.description: Amortized cost, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement and net investment in lease.
940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services.name: TimeDeposits

children.name: TimeDeposits100000OrMore
children.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit
children.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations that meet or exceed the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: TimeDepositsLessThan100000
children.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of less than $100,000.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit.
940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryByInterestRateTypeOneToFiveYears

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueFromOneToTwoYearsOfBalanceSheetDate
children.description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueFromTwoToThreeYearsOfBalanceSheetDate
children.description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueFromThreeToFourYearsOfBalanceSheetDate
children.description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueFromFourToFiveYearsOfBalanceSheetDate
children.description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services.description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services.name: AdvancesFromFederalHomeLoanBanks

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueInNextRollingTwelveMonths
children.description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueInRollingYearTwo
children.description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueInRollingYearThree
children.description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueInRollingYearFour
children.description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueInRollingYearFive
children.description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSummaryDueAfterRollingYearFive
children.description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services.description: Amount of borrowings as of the balance sheet date from the Federal Home Loan Bank, which are primarily used to cover shortages in the required reserve balance and liquidity shortages.
940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services.name: BenefitsLossesAndExpenses

children.name: PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet
children.description: Amount, after effects of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to the provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsPeriodExpense
children.description: Amount of expense (income) recognized due to changes in the accrued obligation to policyholders that relates to insured events.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: InterestCreditedToPolicyholdersAccountBalances
children.description: Amount of interest expense for allocation to policyholder account balance.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: PolicyholderDividends
children.description: Amount of expense for dividends to policyholders.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: OperatingExpenses
FloorBrokerageExchangeAndClearanceFees
children.description: The amount of expense during the period for floor brokerage fees paid to other broker-dealers to execute trades on their behalf, stock exchange fees, order flow fees, and clearance fees.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense
children.description: The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: DepreciationAndAmortization
children.description: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: AmortizationOfMortgageServicingRightsMSRs
children.description: The periodic amortization (in proportion to and over the period of estimated net servicing income or loss) of capitalized servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: RestructuringSettlementAndImpairmentProvisions
children.description: Amount of restructuring charges, remediation cost, and asset impairment loss.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: OtherNonrecurringIncomeExpense
children.description: Amount of other expense (income) that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: OtherExpenses
children.description: Amount of expense classified as other.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: RoyaltyExpense
children.description: Amount of expense related to royalty payments under a contractual arrangement such as payment for mineral and drilling rights and use of technology or intellectual property.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: AccretionExpenseIncludingAssetRetirementObligations
children.description: Amount of accretion expense, which includes, but is not limited to, accretion expense from asset retirement obligations, environmental remediation obligations, and other contingencies.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: PreOpeningCosts
children.description: Expenditures associated with opening new locations which are noncapital in nature and expensed as incurred.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: LegalFees
children.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: GainLossOnRepurchaseOfDebtInstrument
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) from the difference between the repurchase price of a debt instrument initially issued by the entity and the net carrying amount of the debt at the time of its repurchase.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: InducedConversionOfConvertibleDebtExpense
children.description: Amount of expense for inducement to convert debt instrument representing fair value of security and other consideration transferred in excess of fair value of security and other consideration issuable pursuant to conversion privilege provided in terms of existing instrument.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
children.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: GainsLossesOnSalesOfAssets
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets utilized in financial service operations.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: GainLossOnSaleOfLeasedAssetsNetOperatingLeases
children.description: The net gain (loss) arising from the lessor's sale of assets held- or available-for-lease under contractual arrangements classified as operating leases.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: GainsLossesOnSalesOfOtherRealEstate
children.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from sales and other disposals of other real estate owned, increases (decreases) in the valuation allowance for foreclosed real estate, and write-downs of other real estate owned after acquisition or physical possession.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: GainLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiaryOrEquityMethodInvestee
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) from sale and disposal of integrated set of activities and assets capable of being conducted and managed for purpose of providing return in form of dividend, lower cost, or other economic benefit to investor, owner, member and participant.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt
children.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax
children.description: Aggregate net gain (loss) on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: BusinessCombinationIntegrationRelatedCosts
children.description: Amount of expense for integration-related cost incurred in connection with business combination. Includes system integration and conversion costs; severance and other employee-related costs; restructuring and other post-combination costs. Excludes acquisition-related cost incurred to effect business combination; cost to issue debt or equity securities; and cost related to acquisition of asset.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

children.name: AmortizationOfValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA
children.description: The adjustment that represents the periodic charge against earnings to reduce the value of business acquired (VOBA) over the expected life of the underlying insurance contracts. VOBA reflects the estimated fair value of a life insurance business in force and represents the portion of the cost to acquire the business that is allocated to the value of the right to receive future cash flows from insurance contracts existing at the date of acquisition. Such value is the present value of the actuarially determined projected cash flows for the acquired policies. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.
children.disclosure: 940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services, Banking and Thrift

940001 - Disclosure - Financial Services.description: The total amount of expense recognized during the period for future policy benefits, claims and claims adjustment costs, and for selling, general and administrative costs.

children.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalent. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.
children.disclosure: 160000 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Deposit Based Operations

children.name: DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationCashAndCashEquivalents
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationCash
children.description: Amount of currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits, held by a disposal group.
children.disclosure: 160000 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Deposit Based Operations

children.description: Amount classified as cash and cash equivalents attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.
children.disclosure: 160000 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Deposit Based Operations

160000 - Statement - Statement of Cash F.description: For the entity and the disposal group, cash includes currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. It also includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits in that the Entity may deposit additional funds at any time and also effectively may withdraw funds at any time without prior notice or penalty. Cash equivalents, excluding items classified as marketable securities, include short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash, and so near their maturity that they present minimal risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months. Compensating balance arrangements that do not legally restrict the withdrawal or usage of cash amounts may be reported as Cash and Cash Equivalents, while legally restricted deposits held as compensating balances against borrowing arrangements, contracts entered into with others, or company statements of intention with regard to particular deposits are not generally reported as cash and cash equivalents.
160000 - Statement - Statement of Cash F.disclosure: 160000 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Deposit Based Operations

Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. children.disclosure: 160000 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Deposit Based Operations

children.name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionValueOfLiabilitiesAssumed1
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionDebtAssumed1
children.description: The amount of debt that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.
children.disclosure: 160000 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Deposit Based Operations

children.name: NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionEmployeeBenefitLiabilitiesAssumed1

"Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.
children.disclosure: 160000 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Deposit Based Operations

Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.
children.disclosure: 160000 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Deposit Based Operations

children.description: The total amount of [all] liabilities that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.
children.disclosure: 160000 - Statement - Statement of Cash Flows, Deposit Based Operations

160000 - Statement - Statement of Cash F.description: The net book value of a nonmonetary asset transferred or exchanged in connection with the acquisition of a business or asset in a noncash transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. Nonmonetary assets and liabilities are assets and liabilities that will not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the future.

children.name: TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
children.description: Carrying amount, attributable to parent and noncontrolling interests, of an entity's issued and outstanding stock which is not included within permanent equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with a put option held by an ESOP and stock redeemable by a holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

340000 - Disclosure - Inventory.name: InventoryNet

children.name: InventoryFinishedGoodsNetOfReserves
children.description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of merchandise or goods held by the company that are readily available for sale.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.name: InventoryWorkInProcessAndRawMaterialsNetOfReserves
InventoryWorkInProcessNetOfReserves
children.description: Carrying amount, net of reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of merchandise or goods which are partially completed. This inventory is generally comprised of raw materials, labor and factory overhead costs, which require further materials, labor and overhead to be converted into finished goods, and which generally require the use of estimates to determine percentage complete and pricing.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.name: InventoryRawMaterialsAndPurchasedPartsNetOfReserves
InventoryPartsAndComponentsNetOfReserves
children.description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date for elements of machinery or equipment held for the purpose of replacing similar parts in the course of repair or maintenance.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.name: InventoryRawMaterialsNetOfReserves
children.description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of unprocessed items to be consumed in the manufacturing or production process.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of items purchased for use as components of a finished product or pieces of machinery and equipment plus any items in their natural and unrefined state. This element may be used when the reporting entity combines raw materials and purchased parts into an aggregate amount.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.description: The aggregate carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of items which are partially completed at the time of measurement and unprocessed items that will go through the production process and become part of the final product. This element may be used when the reporting entity combines work in process and raw materials into an aggregate amount.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.name: InventorySuppliesNetOfReserves
children.description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of products used directly or indirectly in the manufacturing or production process, which may or may not become part of the final product. May also include items used in the storage, presentation or transportation of physical goods.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.name: OtherInventoryNetOfReserves
children.description: Amount, after of valuation reserves and allowances, of inventory, classified as other, expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

340000 - Disclosure - Inventory.description: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

340000 - Disclosure - Inventory.name: LIFOInventoryAmount

children.name: InventoryGross
InventoryFinishedGoods
children.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of completed merchandise or goods expected to be sold within one year or operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.name: InventoryWorkInProcessAndRawMaterials
InventoryWorkInProcess
children.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of merchandise or goods in the production process expected to be completed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.name: InventoryRawMaterials
children.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of raw materials expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.name: InventoryOreStockpilesOnLeachPads
children.description: Amount before last-in first-out (LIFO) and valuation reserves of ore stockpile material contained on a leach pad, for example, but not limited to, copper or gold ore.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.name: OtherInventorySupplies
children.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of other supplies used within the manufacturing or production process expected to be consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.description: The aggregate carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of items held by the entity which are partially completed at the time of measurement and unprocessed items that will go through the production process and become part of the final product. Includes supplies used directly or indirectly in the manufacturing or production process. This element may be used when the reporting entity combines work in process and raw materials into an aggregate amount.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.name: InventoryForLongTermContractsOrPrograms
children.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves, and progress payments, of inventory associated with long-term contracts, expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.name: OtherInventory
children.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of other inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies held for future sale or to be used in manufacturing, servicing or production process.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

children.name: InventoryLIFOReserve
children.description: Amount by which inventory stated at last-in first-out (LIFO) is less than (in excess of) inventory stated at other inventory cost methods.
children.disclosure: 340000 - Disclosure - Inventory

340000 - Disclosure - Inventory.description: The amount of LIFO (last in first out) inventory present at the reporting date when inventory is also valued using different valuation methods.

108050 - Statement - Statement of Financ.disclosure: 108050 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

108050 - Statement - Statement of Financ.name: FederalFundsPurchasedAndSecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchase

children.name: FederalFundsPurchased
children.description: Amount of short term borrowing where a bank borrows, at the federal funds rate, from another bank.
children.disclosure: 108050 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchase
children.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.
children.disclosure: 108050 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

108050 - Statement - Statement of Financ.description: Amount after offset of short term borrowing where a bank borrows, at the federal funds rate, from another bank and securities that an entity sells and agrees to repurchase at a specified date for a specified price.
108050 - Statement - Statement of Financ.disclosure: 108050 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

108050 - Statement - Statement of Financ.name: FederalFundsSoldAndSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResell

children.name: FederalFundsSold
children.description: The amount outstanding of funds lent to other depository institutions, securities brokers, or securities dealers in the form of Federal Funds sold; for example, immediately available funds lent under agreements or contracts that mature in one business day or roll over under a continuing contract, regardless of the nature of the transaction or the collateral involved, excluding overnight lending for commercial and industrial purposes. Also include Federal Funds sold under agreements to resell on a gross basis, excluding (1) sales of term Federal Funds, (2) due bills representing purchases of securities or other assets by the reporting bank that have not yet been delivered and similar instruments, (3) resale agreements that mature in more than one business day involving assets other than securities, and (4) yield maintenance dollar repurchase agreements.
children.disclosure: 108050 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResell
children.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes purchases of participations in pools of securities that are subject to a resale agreement, assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.
children.disclosure: 108050 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

108050 - Statement - Statement of Financ.description: Includes: (1) the amount outstanding of funds lent to other depository institutions, securities brokers, or securities dealers in the form of Federal Funds sold; for example, immediately available funds lent under agreements or contracts that mature in one business day or roll over under a continuing contract, regardless of the nature of the transaction or the collateral involved, excluding overnight lending for commercial and industrial purposes. Also include Federal Funds sold under agreements to resell on a gross basis, excluding (1) sales of term Federal Funds, (2) due bills representing purchases of securities or other assets by the reporting bank that have not yet been delivered and similar instruments, (3) resale agreements that mature in more than one business day involving assets other than securities, and (4) yield maintenance dollar repurchase agreements (Federal Funds Sold) and (2) the dollar amount outstanding of funds lent in the form of security resale agreements regardless of maturity, if the agreement requires the bank to resell the identical security purchased or a security that meets the definition of substantially the same in the case of a dollar roll. Also include purchases of participations in pools of securities, regardless of maturity (Securities Purchased Under Agreements to Re-sell).
108050 - Statement - Statement of Financ.disclosure: 108050 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

108050 - Statement - Statement of Financ.name: InvestmentsAndCash

children.name: Investments

children.disclosure: 108050 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue
children.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalent. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.
children.disclosure: 108050 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

108050 - Statement - Statement of Financ.description: Sum of investments and unrestricted cash as of the balance sheet date.
108050 - Statement - Statement of Financ.disclosure: 108050 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

108050 - Statement - Statement of Financ.disclosure: 108050 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

108050 - Statement - Statement of Financ.disclosure: 108050 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Unclassified - Deposit Based Operations

children.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseAfterAdjustmentsAndTaxNoncontrollingInterest1

Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassification for sale and settlement, and amount recognized under systematic and rational method.
children.disclosure: 148410 - Statement - Statement of Other Comprehensive Income

children.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeExcludedComponentIncreaseDecreaseAfterAdjustmentsTaxNoncontrollingInterest1

Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassification for sale and settlement, and amount recognized under systematic and rational method.
children.disclosure: 148410 - Statement - Statement of Other Comprehensive Income

children.description: Amount, after tax and adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge, attributable to noncontrolling interest. children.disclosure: 148410 - Statement - Statement of Other Comprehensive Income

710000 - Disclosure - Compensation Relat.name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPSharesInESOP

children.name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPNumberOfAllocatedShares
children.description: The shares or units in an ESOP trust that have been assigned to individual participant accounts based on a known formula. IRS rules require allocations to be nondiscriminatory generally based on compensation, length of service, or a combination of both. For any particular participant such shares or units may be vested, unvested, or partially vested.
children.disclosure: 710000 - Disclosure - Compensation Related Costs, Share Based Payments

children.name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPNumberOfCommittedToBeReleasedShares
children.description: The shares that, although not legally released, will be released by a future scheduled and committed debt service payment and will be allocated to employees for service rendered in the current accounting period. The ESOP documents typically define the period of service to which the shares relate. ESOP shares are released to compensate employees directly, to settle employer liabilities for other employee benefits, and to replace dividends on allocated shares that are used for debt service.
children.disclosure: 710000 - Disclosure - Compensation Related Costs, Share Based Payments

children.name: EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPNumberOfSuspenseShares

980000 - Disclosure - Regulated Operatio.name: NetRegulatoryAssets

children.name: RegulatoryAssets
RegulatoryAssetsCurrent
children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized costs of regulated entities that are expected to be recovered through revenue sources within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Such costs are capitalized if they meet both of the following criteria: a. It is probable that future revenue in an amount at least equal to the capitalized cost will result from inclusion of that cost in allowable costs for rate-making purposes. b. Based on available evidence, the future revenue will be provided to permit recovery of the previously incurred cost rather than to provide for expected levels of similar future costs. If the revenue will be provided through an automatic rate-adjustment clause, this criterion requires that the regulator's intent clearly be to permit recovery of the previously incurred cost.
children.disclosure: 980000 - Disclosure - Regulated Operations

children.name: RegulatoryAssetsNoncurrent
children.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized costs of regulated entities that are not expected to be recovered through revenue sources within one year or the normal operating cycle if longer.

children.disclosure: 980000 - Disclosure - Regulated Operations

children.description: The amount for the individual regulatory liability as itemized in a table of regulatory liabilities as of the end of the period.

children.description: The liability as of the balance sheet date for the excess of the cumulative actual closed block earnings over the cumulative expected (actuarially determined) closed block earnings (each) for the period from the actuarial calculation date to the date of measurement. The excess will result in future dividends to closed block policyholders, unless offset by less favorable than expected future performance of the closed block. The policyholder dividend obligation, which may not have a negative balance, recognizes that a portion of earnings in certain cases will not inure to the stockholders of the insurance entity.

460000 - Disclosure - Debt.name: LineOfCreditFacilityCurrentBorrowingCapacity

children.name: LineOfCredit
children.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current and noncurrent portions of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.
children.disclosure: 460000 - Disclosure - Debt

children.name: LineOfCreditFacilityRemainingBorrowingCapacity
children.description: Amount of borrowing capacity currently available under the credit facility (current borrowing capacity less the amount of borrowings outstanding).
children.disclosure: 460000 - Disclosure - Debt

460000 - Disclosure - Debt.description: Amount of current borrowing capacity under the credit facility considering any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed (for example, borrowings may be limited by the amount of current assets), but without considering any amounts currently outstanding under the facility.

472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Int.name: ConsolidationLessThanWhollyOwnedSubsidiaryParentOwnershipInterestChangeDueToNetIncomeAttributableToParentAndEffectsOfChangesNet

children.name: NetIncomeLoss
children.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: ConsolidationLessThanWhollyOwnedSubsidiaryParentOwnershipInterestChangesNet
ConsolidationLessThanWhollyOwnedSubsidiaryParentOwnershipInterestChangesSaleOfInterestByParent
children.description: Represents a sale by the parent of a portion of its equity interest in a subsidiary during the period, thereby effecting a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The sale of the equity interest represented by this element does not result in a loss of control by the parent.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: ConsolidationLessThanWhollyOwnedSubsidiaryParentOwnershipInterestChangesIssuanceOfEquityBySubsidiaryToNoncontrollingInterests
children.description: Represents a sale (new stock issuance) by a subsidiary to noncontrolling interests (third parties, parties directly or indirectly unrelated to parent) during the period. The capital transaction by subsidiary does not result in a loss of control by the parent, but does effect a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: ConsolidationLessThanWhollyOwnedSubsidiaryParentOwnershipInterestChangesPurchaseOfInterestByParent
children.description: Represents the purchase by the parent of an additional equity interest in a subsidiary during the period, thereby effecting a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The purchase of the additional equity interest represented by this element increases the parent's controlling interest in the subsidiary.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: ConsolidationLessThanWhollyOwnedSubsidiaryParentOwnershipInterestChangesRepurchaseOfSharesBySubsidiary
children.description: Represents the repurchase of equity (treasury stock) by a subsidiary during the period, thereby effecting a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent; but not deconsolidation by the parent.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: ConsolidationLessThanWhollyOwnedSubsidiaryParentOwnershipInterestChangesAdditionalInterestIssuedToParent
children.description: Represents a (noncash) issuance of additional equity interests to the parent by a subsidiary during the period, thereby effecting a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The additional equity interest represented by this element increases the parent's controlling interest in the subsidiary.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.description: The increase (decrease) during the period impacting the parent's ownership interest in a subsidiary as it relates to the total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The changes to the parent's ownership interest in a subsidiary represented by this element did not arise in a deconsolidation of the subsidiary from the consolidated financial statements.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Int.description: This element represents the total net income attributable to the parent for the period and the effect of net changes during the period impacting the parent's ownership interest in a subsidiary as it relates to the total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The changes to the parent's ownership interest in a subsidiary represented by this element did not result in a deconsolidation of the subsidiary from the consolidated financial statements.

472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Int.name: MinorityInterestPeriodIncreaseDecrease

children.name: NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSubsidiaryEquityIssuance
children.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from subsidiary issuance of equity interests to noncontrolling interest holders.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSaleOfParentEquityInterest
children.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from sale of a portion of the parent's controlling interest.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromBusinessCombination
children.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from a business combination.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
children.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income (loss) and other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistributionsToNoncontrollingInterestHolders
children.description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest balance from payment of dividends or other distributions by the non-wholly owned subsidiary or partially owned entity, included in the consolidation of the parent entity, to the noncontrolling interest holders.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: MinorityInterestDecreaseFromRedemptions
children.description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest (for example, but not limited to, redeeming or purchasing the interests of noncontrolling shareholders, issuance of shares (interests) by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to the parent entity for other than cash, and a buyback of shares (interest) by the non-wholly owned subsidiary from the noncontrolling interests).
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: NoncontrollingInterestDecreaseFromDeconsolidation
children.description: The amount of the reduction or elimination during the period of a noncontrolling interest resulting from the parent's loss of control and deconsolidation of the entity in which one or more outside parties had a noncontrolling interest.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Int.description: Net Increase or Decrease in balance of noncontrolling interest in the subsidiary during the reporting period.

472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Int.name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityFairValue

children.name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCommonFairValue
children.description: The fair value as of the reporting date of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. The noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) may be in the form of common shares (regardless of class), limited partnership units (regardless of class), non-preferential membership interests, or any other form of common equity regardless of investee entity legal form.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityPreferredFairValue
children.description: The fair value as of the reporting date of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. The noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) may be in the form of preferred shares (regardless of class), preferred partnership units (regardless of class), preferential membership interests, or any other form of preferred equity regardless of investee entity legal form.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityOtherFairValue
children.description: Fair value of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the parent entity and classified as other equity.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Int.description: The aggregate fair value as of the reporting date of all noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. This item includes noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) regardless of the type of equity interest (common, preferred, other) including all potential organizational (legal) forms of the investee entity.

472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Int.name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityRedemptionValue

children.name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCommonRedemptionValue
children.description: Redemption value, as if currently redeemable, of redeemable noncontrolling interest for common shares, units or ownership interests classified as temporary equity and the election has been made to accrete changes in redemption value to the earliest redemption date.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityPreferredRedemptionValue
children.description: Redemption value, as if currently redeemable, of redeemable noncontrolling interest for preferred shares, units or ownership interests classified as temporary equity and the election has been made to accrete changes in redemption value to the earliest redemption date.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

children.name: RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityOtherRedemptionValue
children.description: Redemption value, as if currently redeemable, of redeemable noncontrolling interest for other shares, units or ownership interests classified as temporary equity and the election has been made to accrete changes in redemption value to the earliest redemption date.
children.disclosure: 472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Interest

472000 - Disclosure - Noncontrolling Int.description: Redemption value, as if currently redeemable, of redeemable noncontrolling interest classified as temporary equity and the election has been made to accrete changes in redemption value to the earliest redemption date.

children.name: HealthCareOrganizationHealthCareCostsGross
HealthCareOrganizationStopLossInsurancePremiumExpense
children.description: Stop-loss insurance premiums recognized as expense. In stop-loss insurance, prepaid health care providers or associated entities transfer portions of their financial risks to other companies. A provider typically contracts to recover health care costs in excess of stated amounts during the contract periods.
children.disclosure: 955000 - Disclosure - Health Care Organizations

children.name: HealthCareOrganizationContractAcquisitionExpense
children.description: Costs associated with marketing of subscriber contracts and member enrollments. For example, commissions paid to agents or brokers and incentive compensation based on new enrollments. Includes also salaries of the marketing director and staff, general marketing brochures, and general advertising and promotion expenses.
children.disclosure: 955000 - Disclosure - Health Care Organizations

children.description: Total expenses of a HCO before stop-loss insurance recoveries. Costs of services rendered (including costs of services rendered but not yet reported).
children.disclosure: 955000 - Disclosure - Health Care Organizations

children.name: HealthCareOrganizationStopLossInsuranceRecoveries
children.description: Amount of stop-loss insurance recoveries. In stop-loss insurance, prepaid health care providers or associated entities transfer portions of their financial risks to other companies. A provider typically contracts to recover health care costs in excess of stated amounts during the contract periods.
children.disclosure: 955000 - Disclosure - Health Care Organizations

955000 - Disclosure - Health Care Organi.description: Total costs of health care costs, net of recoveries of stop-loss insurance. Costs of services rendered (including costs of services rendered but not yet reported).

children.disclosure: 955000 - Disclosure - Health Care Organizations

955000 - Disclosure - Health Care Organi.description: Amount of the accrued liability on a discounted basis for malpractice claims (including general and professional liability).

children.description: Carrying amount, attributable to parent and noncontrolling interests, of an entity's issued and outstanding stock which is not included within permanent equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with a put option held by an ESOP and stock redeemable by a holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.
children.disclosure: 104050 - Statement - Statement of Financial Position, Classified
