children.description: Amount included in accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for prior service cost (credit) expected to be recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit) for fiscal year following most recent annual statement of financial position.
children.disclosure: 730000 - Disclosure - Compensation Related Costs, Retirement Benefits

children.name: DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedAmortizationOfTransitionAssetObligationNextFiscalYear
children.description: Amount included in accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for transition asset (obligation) expected to be recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit for fiscal year following most recent annual statement of financial position.
children.disclosure: 730000 - Disclosure - Compensation Related Costs, Retirement Benefits

730000 - Disclosure - Compensation Relat.description: Amount of cost (credit) included in accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss expected to be recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit) for fiscal year following most recent annual statement of financial position.
730000 - Disclosure - Compensation Relat.disclosure: 730000 - Disclosure - Compensation Related Costs, Retirement Benefits

124003 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeIncomeTaxesMinorityInterestAndIncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments

children.name: Revenues
InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLoanLoss
InterestIncomeExpenseNet
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases
children.description: The aggregate interest and fee income generated by: (1) loans the Entity has positive intent and ability to hold for the foreseeable future, or until maturity or payoff, including commercial and consumer loans, whether domestic or foreign, which may consist of: (a) industrial and agricultural; (b) real estate; and (c) real estate construction loans; (d) trade financing; (e) lease financing; (f) home equity lines-of-credit; (g) automobile and other vehicle loans; and (h) credit card and other revolving-type loans and (2) loans and leases held-for-sale which may include mortgage loans, direct financing, and sales-type leases.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestIncomeAndFeesBankersAcceptancesCertificatesOfDepositAndCommercialPaper
children.description: Interest and fee income derived from banker's acceptances, certificates of deposit and commercial paper.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestIncomePurchasedReceivables
children.description: Interest earned from receivables purchased; for instance, receivables purchased through a factoring arrangement.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestIncomeDepositsWithFinancialInstitutions
children.description: Interest income derived from funds deposited with both domestic and foreign financial institutions including funds in money market and other accounts.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestIncomeFederalFundsSoldAndSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToResell
children.description: The aggregate interest income earned from (1) the lending of excess federal funds to another commercial bank requiring such for its legal reserve requirements and (2) securities purchased under agreements to resell.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestIncomeOperating
InterestIncomeSecuritiesMortgageBacked
children.description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securitized, pass-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestIncomeSecuritiesStateAndMunicipal
children.description: Interest income, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, derived from debt securities issued by municipal governments, local taxing districts and US state government agencies.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestIncomeSecuritiesUSTreasuryAndOtherUSGovernment
InterestIncomeSecuritiesUSTreasury
children.description: Interest income on US treasury securities. US treasury securities are negotiable debt obligations of the US government, secured by its full faith and credit and issued at various schedules and maturities. The income from treasury securities is exempt from state and local, but not federal, taxes. There are three types of securities issued by the US treasury (bonds, bills, and notes), which are distinguished by the amount of time from the initial sale of the bond to maturity.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestIncomeSecuritiesOtherUSGovernment
children.description: Interest income on securities issued by US government agencies not including US Treasury Securities.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on U.S. Treasury securities and other U.S. government securities.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestIncomeSecuritiesCorporateDebtOperating
children.description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on corporate debt securities.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount of operating interest income, including, but not limited to, amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts on securities.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestExpenseOperating
children.description: Amount of interest expense classified as operating.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount of interest income (expense) classified as operating.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses
children.description: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount of interest income or expense, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, including consideration of the provisions for loan, lease, credit, and other related losses.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NoninterestIncome
DividendIncomeOperating
children.description: Amount of operating dividend income on securities.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InvestmentBankingAdvisoryBrokerageAndUnderwritingFeesAndCommissions
InvestmentBankingRevenue
children.description: Includes (1) underwriting revenue (the spread between the resale price received and the cost of the securities and related expenses) generated through the purchasing, distributing and reselling of new issues of securities (alternatively, could be a secondary offering of a large block of previously issued securities); and (2) fees earned for mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, restructurings, and other types of financial advisory services.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: UnderwritingIncomeLoss
children.description: The difference between the price paid by the public and the contract price less the related expenses. A broker-dealer may underwrite a security offering by contracting to buy the issue either at a fixed price or a price based on selling the offering on a best-effort basis.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount of fees and commissions from banking, advisory, brokerage, and securities underwriting activities. Activities include, but are not limited to, underwriting securities, private placements of securities, investment advisory and management services, merger and acquisition services, sale and servicing of mutual funds, and other related consulting fees.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: PrincipalTransactionsRevenue
children.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) resulting from the difference between acquisition price and selling price or fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities, and from the firm's direct investment activity, conducted separately from customer trading activities, including, but not limited to, investments in private equity, alternative investment products, real estate, and exchanges and memberships.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: PremiumsEarnedNet
DirectPremiumsEarned
children.description: Amount, before premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: CededPremiumsEarned
children.description: Amount of earned premiums ceded to other entities.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: AssumedPremiumsEarned
children.description: Amount of earned premiums assumed from other entities.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: GainsLossesOnSalesOfAssets
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets utilized in financial service operations.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: GainLossOnSaleOfLeasedAssetsNetOperatingLeases
children.description: The net gain (loss) arising from the lessor's sale of assets held- or available-for-lease under contractual arrangements classified as operating leases.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: GainLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiaryOrEquityMethodInvestee
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) from sale and disposal of integrated set of activities and assets capable of being conducted and managed for purpose of providing return in form of dividend, lower cost, or other economic benefit to investor, owner, member and participant.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax
GainOnDerivativeInstrumentsPretax
children.description: Aggregate gain on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: LossOnDerivativeInstrumentsPretax
children.description: Aggregate loss on all derivative instruments charged against earnings during the period, before tax effects.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Aggregate net gain (loss) on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NoninterestIncomeOther
children.description: Represents the total of noninterest income derived from certain activities and assets including (for example): (1) venture capital investments; (2) bank owned life insurance; (3) foreign currency transactions; and (4) mortgage servicing rights.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: VentureCapitalGainsLossesNet
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) on venture capital activities. Includes venture capital revenue, fair value adjustments, interest and dividends, investment gain (loss) and fee or other income from venture capital activities.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: BankOwnedLifeInsuranceIncome
children.description: Earnings on or other increases in the value of the cash surrender value of bank owned life insurance policies.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: ProfitLossFromRealEstateOperations
children.description: The net cost of operation of other real estate (including provisions for real estate losses, rental income, and gains and losses on sales of real estate).
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: RealEstateInvestmentPartnershipRevenue
children.description: Amount of revenue recognized from investments in real estate partnerships and variable interest entities.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: ConversionGainsAndLossesOnForeignInvestments
children.description: Represents gains or losses resulting from transactions conducted in foreign currencies.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: GainLossOnSaleOfPreviouslyUnissuedStockBySubsidiaryOrEquityInvesteeNonoperatingIncome
children.description: The profit or loss on sales of previously unissued stock by subsidiaries or equity investees made to investors outside the consolidated group that is not reported as operating income. Represents the difference in the parent company's carrying amount of the equity interest in the subsidiary or equity investee immediately before and after the transaction.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: MortgageServicingRightsMSRImpairmentRecovery
children.description: The adjustment to the carrying value of the rights retained or purchased to service mortgages. These adjustments are made when the estimate of the fair value is changed. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossBeforeTax
ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainBeforeTax
children.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain recognized in the income statement.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: ForeignCurrencyTransactionLossBeforeTax
children.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized loss recognized in the income statement.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount, before tax, of realized and unrealized gain (loss) from foreign currency transaction.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DebtInstrumentConvertibleBeneficialConversionFeature
children.description: Amount of a favorable spread to a debt holder between the amount of debt being converted and the value of the securities received upon conversion. This is an embedded conversion feature of convertible debt issued that is in-the-money at the commitment date.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt
children.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome
children.description: Amount of revenue earned, classified as other, excluding interest income.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: The total amount of noninterest income which may be derived from: (1) fees and commissions; (2) premiums earned; (3) insurance policy charges; (4) the sale or disposal of assets; and (5) other sources not otherwise specified.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NoninterestExpense
PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet
children.description: Amount, after effects of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to the provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: LaborAndRelatedExpense
DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndividualCompensationExpense
children.description: The compensation expense recognized during the period pertaining to the deferred compensation arrangement.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount of expense for salary, wage, profit sharing; incentive and equity-based compensation; and other employee benefit.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: TaxesExcludingIncomeAndExciseTaxes
children.description: All taxes not related to income of the entity or excise or sales taxes levied on the revenue of the entity that are not reported elsewhere. These taxes could include production, real estate, personal property, and pump tax.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NoninterestExpenseRelatedToPerformanceFees
children.description: Incentive fees which are compensation paid to a trading advisor or to any practitioner who achieves investment results above a specified contractual level.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: ProfessionalFees
children.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NoninterestExpenseInvestmentAdvisoryFees
children.description: Amount of expense for investment advisory service, including, but not limited to, managing money in fund.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NoninterestExpenseTransferAgentAndCustodianFees
children.description: Amount of expense for transfer agent and custodian services. Includes, but is not limited to, fee paid for maintaining investor record, account balance, and company's stock transaction and fee paid for holding and safeguarding assets of individual, mutual fund, and investment company.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NoninterestExpenseDirectorsFees
children.description: Amount of expense for service provided by entity's director.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: OrganizationalAndOfferingCostsExpense
OrganizationalCostExpense
children.description: Amount of expense for formation and organizational costs incurred to establish entity to do business.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NoninterestExpenseOfferingCost
children.description: Amount of expense for cost associated with issuance of security by investment company. Includes, but is not limited to, legal fee pertaining to share offered for sale, registration fee, underwriting, printing prospectus, and initial fee for listing on exchange.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount of expense for cost associated with issuance of security by investment company and for formation and organizational costs incurred to establish entity to do business.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NoninterestExpenseCommissionExpense
children.description: Amount of fees incurred for commissions on mutual funds and insurance products.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NoninterestExpensePrintingAndFulfillment
children.description: Amounts expended for printing of marketing and compliance communications and fulfillment services.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: FloorBrokerageExchangeAndClearanceFees
children.description: The amount of expense during the period for floor brokerage fees paid to other broker-dealers to execute trades on their behalf, stock exchange fees, order flow fees, and clearance fees.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: SubadvisoryFeesForMutualFunds
children.description: Subadvisory fees that the funds adviser pays for out of the management fee, which it receives from the fund.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: ExpenseRelatedToDistributionOrServicingAndUnderwritingFees
children.description: Expense related to distribution, servicing and underwriting fees.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: BusinessDevelopment
children.description: Business development involves the development of products and services, their delivery, design and their implementation. Business development includes a number of techniques designed to grow an economic enterprise. Such techniques include, but are not limited to, assessments of marketing opportunities and target markets, intelligence gathering on customers and competitors, generating leads for possible sales, follow-up sales activity, formal proposal writing and business model design. Business development involves evaluating a business and then realizing its full potential, using such tools as marketing, sales, information management and customer service.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: CommunicationsInformationTechnologyAndOccupancy
children.description: The aggregate amount of communications, data processing and occupancy expenses.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: ForeclosedRealEstateExpense
children.description: Amount of expense recognized during the period for the foreclosure on real estate assets.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: RealEstateInvestmentPartnershipCostOfSales
children.description: Amount of cost of sales related to investments in real estate partnerships and variable interest entities.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: AccretionExpenseIncludingAssetRetirementObligations
children.description: Amount of accretion expense, which includes, but is not limited to, accretion expense from asset retirement obligations, environmental remediation obligations, and other contingencies.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DepreciationAndAmortization
children.description: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: EquipmentExpense
children.description: This element represents equipment expense including depreciation, repairs, rentals, and service contract costs. This item also includes equipment purchases which do not qualify for capitalization in accordance with the entity's accounting policy. This item may also include furniture expenses.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: SuppliesAndPostageExpense
children.description: The aggregate amount of expenses directly related to the supplies and postage.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: FederalDepositInsuranceCorporationPremiumExpense
children.description: Amount of expense for Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
children.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense
children.description: The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: LoanProcessingFee
children.description: Expenses paid for obtaining loans which includes expenses such as application and origination fees.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: RecapitalizationCosts
children.description: Amount of recapitalization costs for professional fees associated with restructuring debt and equity mixture that do not qualify for capitalization.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: RestructuringSettlementAndImpairmentProvisions
children.description: Amount of restructuring charges, remediation cost, and asset impairment loss.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: RoyaltyExpense
children.description: Amount of expense related to royalty payments under a contractual arrangement such as payment for mineral and drilling rights and use of technology or intellectual property.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: PreOpeningCosts
children.description: Expenditures associated with opening new locations which are noncapital in nature and expensed as incurred.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: LegalFees
children.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: UnsolicitedTenderOfferCosts
children.description: Costs incurred in connection with an unsolicited tender offer (one where the Entity being sought has not requested the offer). These would include costs relating to evaluation and dissemination of information regarding an unsolicited tender offer. A tender offer is a broad solicitation by an Entity or a third party to purchase a substantial percentage of another entity's shares or units for a limited period of time. The offer is at a fixed price, usually at a premium over the current market price, and is contingent on shareholders' tendering a fixed number of their shares or units.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: OtherNoninterestExpense
children.description: Amount of noninterest expense classified as other.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: BusinessCombinationIntegrationRelatedCosts
children.description: Amount of expense for integration-related cost incurred in connection with business combination. Includes system integration and conversion costs; severance and other employee-related costs; restructuring and other post-combination costs. Excludes acquisition-related cost incurred to effect business combination; cost to issue debt or equity securities; and cost related to acquisition of asset.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: LossContingencyLossInPeriod
children.description: The amount of loss pertaining to the specified contingency that was charged against earnings in the period, including the effects of revisions in previously reported estimates.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NetPeriodicDefinedBenefitsExpenseReversalOfExpenseExcludingServiceCostComponent
children.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for net periodic benefit cost components, excluding service cost component, of defined benefit plan. Amount includes, but is not limited to, interest cost, expected (return) loss on plan asset, amortization of prior service cost (credit), amortization of (gain) loss, amortization of transition (asset) obligation, settlement (gain) loss, curtailment (gain) loss and certain termination benefits.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Total aggregate amount of all noninterest expense.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

124003 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of income (loss) from equity method investments.

124003 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: IncomeLossAttributableToParent

children.name: NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners
children.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to general partners.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners
children.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to limited partners.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

124003 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to parent. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

124003 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: UndistributedEarningsLossAvailableToCommonShareholdersDiluted

children.name: UndistributedEarningsDiluted
DistributedEarnings
children.description: The total amount of dividends declared in the period for each class of stock and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid for the period (for example, unpaid cumulative dividends). Dividends declared in the current period do not include dividends declared in respect of prior-period unpaid cumulative dividends. Preferred dividends that are cumulative only if earned are deducted only to the extent that they are earned.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentDiluted
NetIncomeLoss
children.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: InterestOnConvertibleDebtNetOfTax
children.description: Amount, after tax, of interest recognized on convertible debt instrument excluding interest on principal required to be paid in cash.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: ConvertiblePreferredDividendsNetOfTax
children.description: The after-tax amount of any dividends on convertible preferred stock.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: DilutiveSecurities
children.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise stock options, restrictive stock units (RSUs), convertible preferred stock of an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP), and other dilutive convertible securities.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent, and includes adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive convertible securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed. Includes the adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToParticipatingSecuritiesDiluted
UndistributedDiscontinuedOperationEarningsLossAllocationToParticipatingSecuritiesDiluted
children.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations allocated to participating securities for diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: UndistributedContinuingOperationEarningsLossAllocationToParticipatingSecuritiesDiluted
children.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations allocated to participating securities for diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

124003 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss), allocated to common stock, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

124003 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: UndistributedEarningsLossAvailableToCommonShareholdersBasic

children.name: UndistributedEarningsLossFromContinuingOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersBasic
children.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations allocated to common stock as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: UndistributedEarningsLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAvailableToCommonShareholdersBasic
children.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations allocated to common stock as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

124003 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to common stock as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

124003 - Statement - Statement of Income.name: UndistributedEarnings

children.name: UndistributedContinuingOperationEarningsLossBasic
children.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations, allocated to common stock and participating securities, as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

children.name: UndistributedDiscontinuedOperationEarningsLossBasic
children.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations, allocated to common stock and participating securities, as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.
children.disclosure: 124003 - Statement - Statement of Income

124003 - Statement - Statement of Income.description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed.

985000 - Disclosure - Other Industries.name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservesNet

children.name: ProvedDevelopedReservesVolume
children.description: Net quantities of an enterprise's interests in proved developed reserves of either crude oil (including condensate and natural gas liquids), natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas as of the beginning and the end of the year. "Net" quantities of reserves include those relating to the enterprise's operating and nonoperating interests in properties. Quantities of reserves relating to royalty interests owned are included in "net" quantities if the necessary information is available to the enterprise. "Net" quantities does not include reserves relating to interests of others in properties owned by the enterprise. The unit of measure for reserve quantities is defined as "barrels" for oil and synthetic oil reserves or "cubic feet" or "cubic meters" for natural gas and synthetic gas reserves.
children.disclosure: 985000 - Disclosure - Other Industries

children.name: ProvedUndevelopedReserveVolume
children.description: Net quantities of an enterprise's interests in proved undeveloped reserves of either crude oil (including condensate and natural gas liquids), natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other renewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas as of the beginning and the end of the year. "Net" quantities of reserves include those relating to the enterprise's operating and nonoperating interests in properties. Quantities of reserves relating to royalty interests owned are included in "net" quantities if the necessary information is available to the enterprise. "Net" quantities does not include reserves relating to interests of others in properties owned by the enterprise. The unit of measure for reserve quantities is defined as "barrels" for oil and synthetic oil reserves or "cubic feet" or "cubic meters" for natural gas and synthetic gas reserves.
children.disclosure: 985000 - Disclosure - Other Industries

985000 - Disclosure - Other Industries.description: The net quantity of proved reserves as of the balance sheet date. Proved oil reserves are the estimated quantities of crude oil and natural gas liquids which geological and engineering data demonstrate with reasonable certainty to be recoverable.

children.name: ProvedDevelopedReservesBOE1

children.disclosure: 985000 - Disclosure - Other Industries

children.name: ProvedUndevelopedReserveBOE1
children.description: Energy measure of proved undeveloped reserves of crude oil, including condensate and natural gas liquids, natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas.
children.disclosure: 985000 - Disclosure - Other Industries

985000 - Disclosure - Other Industries.description: Energy measure of proved reserve of oil and gas, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

children.description: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from the extension of the proved acreage of previously discovered reservoir or discovery of new field with proved reserve or of new reservoir of proved reserve in old field, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).
children.disclosure: 965000 - Disclosure - Extractive Industries

children.name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReserveProductionEnergy
children.description: Energy measure of decrease in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from production, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).
children.disclosure: 965000 - Disclosure - Extractive Industries

children.name: ProvedDevelopedAndUndevelopedReservesSaleOfMineralInPlaceEnergy
children.description: Energy measure of decrease in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from sale of mineral in place, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).
children.disclosure: 965000 - Disclosure - Extractive Industries

965000 - Disclosure - Extractive Industr.description: Energy measure of increase (decrease) of quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

children.description: Fair value portion of notes payable.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: LoansPayableFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of contractual obligation to pay money on demand or on fixed or determinable dates.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: LinesOfCreditFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of contractual arrangement with a lender under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: ConvertibleDebtFairValueDisclosures
children.description: Fair value portion of borrowing which can be exchanged for a specified number of another security at the option of the issuer or the holder, for example, but not limited to, the entity's common stock.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisSubordinatedDebtObligations
children.description: Fair value of subordinated debt obligations including, but not limited to, subordinated loan, subordinated bond, subordinated debenture or junior debt.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.description: Fair value portion of debt instrument payable, including, but not limited to, notes payable and loans payable.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: TradingLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of liabilities pertaining to principal and customer trading transactions, or which may be incurred with the objective of generating a profit from short-term fluctuations in price as part of an entity's market-making, hedging and proprietary trading. Examples include, but are not limited to, short positions in securities, derivatives and commodities.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FederalFundsPurchasedAndSecuritiesLoanedOrSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseFairValueDisclosure
FederalFundsPurchasedFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of short term borrowing where a bank borrows, at the federal funds rate, from another bank.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: SecuritiesLoanedOrSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of securities that an entity sells and agrees to repurchase at a specified date for a specified price.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.description: Fair value portion of short term borrowing where a bank borrows, at the federal funds rate, from another bank and securities that an entity sells and agrees to repurchase at a specified date for a specified price.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FederalHomeLoanBankBorrowingsFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of borrowing from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: DerivativeLiabilities
children.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: ForeignCurrencyContractsLiabilityFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of liability contracts related to the exchange of different currencies, including, but not limited to, foreign currency options, forward (delivery or nondelivery) contracts, and swaps entered into.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: GuaranteesFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of guarantee, including, but not limited to, financial standby letter of credit, fair value guarantee, guarantee of collection of scheduled contractual cash flows from financial assets, and contracts that contingently require the guarantor to make payments or perform services.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: LiabilitiesRelatedToInvestmentContractsFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of liability related to investment contracts for example, but not limited to, guaranteed investment contract or annuities.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: MandatorilyRedeemablePreferredStockFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of shares that an entity is required to redeem for cash or other assets at a fixed or determinable date or upon the occurrence of an event.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FinancialInstrumentsSoldNotYetPurchasedAtFairValue
children.description: Fair value of obligations incurred from short sales.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: ServicingLiabilityAtFairValueAmount
children.description: Fair value of a liability representing servicing arrangements under which the estimated future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: DepositsFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of deposit liabilities held by the entity, including, but not limited to, foreign and domestic, interest and noninterest bearing, demand deposits, saving deposits, negotiable orders of withdrawal (NOW) and time deposits.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.description: Fair value of financial obligations, including, but not limited to, debt instruments, derivative liabilities, federal funds purchased and sold under agreements to repurchase, securities loaned or sold under agreements to repurchase, financial instruments sold not yet purchased, guarantees, line of credit, loans and notes payable, servicing liability, and trading liabilities.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: NonfinancialLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure
AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure
AccountsPayableFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of liabilities incurred for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business and related party payables.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: AccruedLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of accrued expenses.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.description: Fair value portion of trade and related party payables and accrued expenses.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringBasisObligations
children.description: Fair value of obligations measured on a recurring basis.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: CommitmentsFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of arrangements with third parties, including, but not limited to, operating lease arrangement and arrangement in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services, or has agreed to commit resources to supply goods or services.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: OtherLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure
children.description: Fair value portion of other liabilities.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.description: Fair value of obligations not classified as financial liabilities. Includes, but is not limited to, accounts payable and accrued liabilities, commitments, obligations, and other liabilities.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.description: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measure.description: Fair value of asset after deduction of liability.
815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measure.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measure.name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationPeriodIncreaseDecrease

children.name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationTransfersNet
FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationTransfersIntoLevel3
children.description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset) into level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationTransfersOutOfLevel3
children.description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset) out of level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset) into (out of) level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationPurchasesSalesIssuesSettlements
FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationPurchases
children.description: Amount of purchases of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationSales
children.description: Amount of sales of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationIssues
children.description: Amount of issuances of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationSettlements
children.description: Amount of settlements of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability, measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.description: Amount of purchases, (sales), issuances and (settlements) of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationGainLossIncludedInEarnings
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in income from derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FairValueNetDerivativeAssetLiabilityMeasuredOnRecurringBasisUnobservableInputsReconciliationGainLossIncludedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income from derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measure.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.
815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measure.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measure.name: FairValueOptionLoansHeldAsAssetsAggregateDifference

children.name: FairValueOptionLoansHeldAsAssets90DaysOrMorePastDueAggregateDifference
children.description: For loans held as assets for which the fair value option has been elected, this item represents the difference between the aggregate fair value and the aggregate unpaid principal balance of those loans that are 90 days or more past due.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FairValueOptionLoansHeldAsAssetsAggregateAmountInNonaccrualStatusAggregatedDifference
children.description: For loans held as assets for which the fair value option has been elected, this item represents the difference between the aggregate fair value and the aggregate unpaid principal balance of those loans that are in nonaccrual status.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measure.description: For loans held as assets for which the fair value option has been elected, this item represents the difference between the aggregate fair value and the aggregate unpaid principal balance of those loans that are 90 days or more past due, in nonaccrual status, or both.
815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measure.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measure.name: FairValueRecurringBasisUnobservableInputReconciliationAssetLiabilityGainLossOci

children.name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisLiabilityGainLossIncludedInOtherComprehensiveIncome
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInputsReconciliationRecurringBasisAssetGainLossIncludedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss
children.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from asset measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measure.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from asset (liability) measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).
815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measure.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measure.name: FairValueAssetLiabilityRecurringBasisStillHeldUnrealizedGainLossOci

children.name: FairValueAssetRecurringBasisStillHeldUnrealizedGainLossOci
children.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from asset measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

children.name: FairValueLiabilityRecurringBasisStillHeldUnrealizedGainLossOci
children.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.
children.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures

815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measure.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from asset (liability) measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.
815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measure.disclosure: 815000 - Disclosure - Fair Value Measures and Disclosures
